[03] catubbidhaa hi suddhi desanaasuddhi, sa.mvarasuddhi, pariye.t.thisuddhi, paccavekkha.nasuddhiiti. tattha ^b^desanaasuddhi^eb^ naama paatimokkhasa.mvarasiila.m. ta~nhi desanaaya sujjhanato desanaasuddhiiti vuccati. ^b^sa.mvarasuddhi^eb^ naama indriyasa.mvarasiila.m. ta~nhi ``na puna eva.m karissaamii''ti cittaadhi.t.thaanasa.mvareneva sujjhanato sa.mvarasuddhiiti vuccati. ^b^pariye.t.thisuddhi^eb^ naama aajiivapaarisuddhisiila.m. ta~nhi anesana.m pahaaya dhammena samena paccaye uppaadentassa pariyesanaaya suddhattaa pariye.t.thisuddhiiti ^a^M1.0042^ea^ vuccati. ^b^paccavekkha.nasuddhi^eb^ naama paccayasannissitasiila.m. ta~nhi vuttappakaarena paccavekkha.nena sujjhanato paccavekkha.nasuddhiiti vuccati. tena vutta.m ``pa.tiggaha.ne pana sati.m akatvaa paribhoge karontassa anaapattii''ti.

[03] sattanna.m sekkhaana.m paccayaparibhogo ^b^daayajjaparibhogo^eb^ naama. te hi bhagavato puttaa, tasmaa pitusantakaana.m paccayaana.m daayaadaa hutvaa te paccaye paribhu~njanti. ki.mpanete bhagavato paccaye paribhu~njanti, udaahu gihiina.m paccaye paribhu~njantiiti. gihiihi dinnaapi bhagavataa anu~n~naatattaa bhagavato santakaa honti, tasmaa bhagavato paccaye paribhu~njantiiti veditabbaa. dhammadaayaadasutta~ncettha saadhaka.m.
[03] khii.naasavaana.m paribhogo ^b^saamiparibhogo^eb^ naama. te hi ta.nhaaya daasabya.m atiitattaa saamino hutvaa paribhu~njanti.

[03] imesu paribhogesu saamiparibhogo ca daayajjaparibhogo ca sabbesa.m va.t.tati. i.naparibhogo na va.t.tati. theyyaparibhoge kathaayeva natthi. yo panaaya.m siilavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo, so i.naparibhogassa paccaniikattaa aa.na.nyaparibhogo vaa hoti, daayajjaparibhogeyeva vaa sa"ngaha.m gacchati. siilavaapi hi imaaya sikkhaaya samannaagatattaa sekkhotveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati. imesu pana paribhogesu yasmaa saamiparibhogo aggo, tasmaa ta.m patthayamaanena bhikkhunaa vuttappakaaraaya paccavekkha.naaya paccavekkhitvaa paribhu~njantena paccayasannissitasiila.m sampaadetabba.m. eva.m karonto hi kiccakaarii hoti. vuttampi ceta.m --
[21] ``pi.n.da.m ^a^V1.0042^ea^ vihaara.m sayanaasana~nca,
[27] aapa~nca sa"nghaa.tirajuupavaahana.m.
[26] sutvaana dhamma.m sugatena desita.m,
[22] sa"nkhaaya seve varapa~n~nasaavako..
[21] ``tasmaa ^a^M1.0043^ea^ hi pi.n.de sayanaasane ca,
[27] aape ca sa"nghaa.tirajuupavaahane.
[26] etesu dhammesu anuupalitto,
[22] bhikkhu yathaa pokkhare vaaribindu.. (su0 ni0 393-394).
[21] ``kaalena laddhaa parato anuggahaa,
[27] khajjesu bhojjesu ca saayanesu ca.
[26] matta.m sa ja~n~naa satata.m upa.t.thito,
[22] va.nassa aalepanaruuhane yathaa..
[21] ``kantaare puttama.msa.mva, akkhassabbha~njana.m yathaa.
[22] eva.m aahaare aahaara.m, yaapanatthamamucchito''ti..
[03] imassa ca paccayasannissitasiilassa paripuurakaaritaaya bhaagineyyasa"ngharakkhitasaama.nerassa vatthu kathetabba.m. so hi sammaa paccavekkhitvaa paribhu~nji. yathaaha --
[21] ``upajjhaayo ma.m bhu~njamaana.m, saalikuura.m sunibbuta.m.
[22] maa heva tva.m saama.nera, jivha.m jhaapesi asa~n~nato..
[21] ``upajjhaayassa vaco sutvaa, sa.mvegamalabhi.m tadaa.
[22] ekaasane nisiiditvaa, arahatta.m apaapu.ni.m..
[21] ``soha.m ^a^V1.0043^ea^ paripu.n.nasa"nkappo, cando pannaraso yathaa.
[22] sabbaasavaparikkhii.no, natthi daani punabbhavo''ti..
[21] ``tasmaa a~n~nopi dukkhassa, patthayanto parikkhaya.m.
[22] yoniso paccavekkhitvaa, pa.tisevetha paccaye''ti..
[03] eva.m paatimokkhasa.mvarasiilaadivasena catubbidha.m.
[03] 20^b^.^eb^ pa~ncavidhako.t.thaasassa pa.thamapa~ncake anupasampannasiilaadivasena attho veditabbo. vutta~nheta.m pa.tisambhidaaya.m --

[03] ``katama.m ^a^M1.0044^ea^ pariyantapaarisuddhisiila.m? anupasampannaana.m pariyantasikkhaapadaana.m, ida.m pariyantapaarisuddhisiila.m. katama.m apariyantapaarisuddhisiila.m? upasampannaana.m apariyantasikkhaapadaana.m, ida.m apariyantapaarisuddhisiila.m. katama.m paripu.n.napaarisuddhisiila.m? puthujjanakalyaa.nakaana.m kusaladhamme yuttaana.m sekkhapariyante paripuurakaariina.m kaaye ca jiivite ca anapekkhaana.m pariccattajiivitaana.m, ida.m paripu.n.napaarisuddhisiila.m. katama.m aparaama.t.thapaarisuddhisiila.m? sattanna.m sekkhaana.m, ida.m aparaama.t.thapaarisuddhisiila.m. katama.m pa.tippassaddhipaarisuddhisiila.m? tathaagatasaavakaana.m khii.naasavaana.m paccekabuddhaana.m tathaagataana.m arahantaana.m sammaasambuddhaana.m, ida.m pa.tippassaddhipaarisuddhisiila''nti (pa.ti0 ma0 1.37).
[03] tattha anupasampannaana.m siila.m ga.nanavasena sapariyantattaa ^b^pariyantapaarisuddhisiila^eb^nti veditabba.m. upasampannaana.m --
[21] ``nava ko.tisahassaani, asiitisatako.tiyo.
[22] pa~n~naasasatasahassaani, chatti.msaa ca punaapare..
[21] ``ete ^a^V1.0044^ea^ sa.mvaravinayaa, sambuddhena pakaasitaa.
[22] peyyaalamukhena niddi.t.thaa, sikkhaa vinayasa.mvare''ti.. --

[03] eva.m ga.nanavasena sapariyantampi anavasesavasena samaadaanabhaava~nca laabhayasa~naatia"ngajiivitavasena adi.t.thapariyantabhaava~nca sandhaaya ^b^apariyantapaarisuddhisiila^eb^nti vutta.m, ciragumbavaasikaambakhaadakamahaatissattherassa siilamiva. tathaa hi so aayasmaa --
[21] ``dhana.m caje a"ngavarassa hetu, a"nga.m caje jiivita.m rakkhamaano.
[22] a"nga.m dhana.m jiivita~ncaapi sabba.m, caje naro dhammamanussaranto''ti.. --
[03] ima.m sappurisaanussati.m avijahanto jiivitasa.msayepi sikkhaapada.m aviitikkamma tadeva apariyantapaarisuddhisiila.m nissaaya upaasakassa pi.t.thigatova arahatta.m paapu.ni. yathaaha --
[21] ``na pitaa napi te maataa, na ~naati napi bandhavo.
[22] karotetaadisa.m kicca.m, siilavantassa kaara.naa..
[21] sa.mvega.m ^a^M1.0045^ea^ janayitvaana, sammasitvaana yoniso.
[22] tassa pi.t.thigato santo, arahatta.m apaapu.nii''ti..

[03] puthujjanakalyaa.nakaana.m siila.m upasampadato pa.t.thaaya sudhotajaatima.ni viya suparikammakatasuva.n.na.m viya ca atiparisuddhattaa cittuppaadamattakenapi malena virahita.m arahattasseva pada.t.thaana.m hoti, tasmaa ^b^paripu.n.napaarisuddhii^eb^ti vuccati, mahaasa"ngharakkhitabhaagineyyasa"ngharakkhitattheraana.m viya.

[03] ^b^mahaasa"ngharakkhitatthera.m^eb^ kira atikkantasa.t.thivassa.m mara.nama~nce nipanna.m bhikkhusa"ngho lokuttaraadhigama.m pucchi. thero ``natthi me lokuttaradhammo''ti aaha. athassa upa.t.thaako daharabhikkhu aaha -- ``bhante, tumhe parinibbutaati samantaa dvaadasayojanaa manussaa sannipatitaa, tumhaaka.m puthujjanakaalakiriyaaya mahaajanassa vippa.tisaaro bhavissatii''ti. aavuso, aha.m ``metteyya.m bhagavanta.m passissaamii''ti na vipassana.m pa.t.thapesi.m. tena hi ma.m nisiidaapetvaa ^a^V1.0045^ea^ okaasa.m karohiiti. so thera.m nisiidaapetvaa bahi nikkhanto. thero tassa saha nikkhamanaava arahatta.m patvaa accharikaaya sa~n~na.m adaasi. sa"ngho sannipatitvaa aaha -- ``bhante, evaruupe mara.nakaale lokuttaradhamma.m nibbattentaa dukkara.m karitthaa''ti. naavuso eta.m dukkara.m, apica vo dukkara.m aacikkhissaami -- ``aha.m, aavuso, pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya asatiyaa a~n~naa.napakata.m kamma.m naama na passaamii''ti. bhaagineyyopissa pa~n~naasavassakaale evameva arahatta.m paapu.niiti.
[21] ``appassutopi ce hoti, siilesu asamaahito.
[22] ubhayena na.m garahanti, siilato ca sutena ca..
[21] ``appassutopi ce hoti, siilesu susamaahito.
[22] siilato na.m pasa.msanti, tassa sampajjate suta.m..
[21] ``bahussutopi ce hoti, siilesu asamaahito.
[22] siilato na.m garahanti, naassa sampajjate suta.m..
[21] ``bahussutopi ce hoti, siilesu susamaahito.
[22] ubhayena na.m pasa.msanti, siilato ca sutena ca..
[21] ``bahussuta.m ^a^M1.0046^ea^ dhammadhara.m, sappa~n~na.m buddhasaavaka.m.
[27] nekkha.m jambonadasseva, ko ta.m ninditumarahati.
[22] devaapi na.m pasa.msanti, brahmunaapi pasa.msito''ti.. (a0 ni0 4.6).

[03] sekkhaana.m pana siila.m di.t.thivasena aparaama.t.thattaa, puthujjanaana.m vaa pana raagavasena aparaama.t.thasiila.m ^b^aparaama.t.thapaarisuddhii^eb^ti veditabba.m, ku.tumbiyaputtatissattherassa siila.m viya. so hi aayasmaa tathaaruupa.m siila.m nissaaya arahatte pati.t.thaatukaamo verike aaha --
[21] ``ubho ^a^V1.0046^ea^ paadaani bhinditvaa, sa~n~napessaami vo aha.m.
[22] a.t.tiyaami haraayaami, saraagamara.na.m aha''nti..
[21] ``evaaha.m cintayitvaana, sammasitvaana yoniso.
[22] sampatte aru.nuggamhi, arahatta.m apaapu.ni''nti.. (dii0 ni0 a.t.tha0 2.373).

[01] a~n~nataropi mahaathero baa.lhagilaano sahatthaa aahaarampi paribhu~njitu.m asakkonto sake muttakariise palipanno samparivattati, ta.m disvaa a~n~nataro daharo ``aho dukkhaa jiivitasa"nkhaaraa''ti aaha. tamena.m mahaathero aaha -- ``aha.m, aavuso, idaani miyyamaano saggasampatti.m labhissaami, natthi me ettha sa.msayo, ima.m pana siila.m bhinditvaa laddhasampatti naama sikkha.m paccakkhaaya pa.tiladdhagihibhaavasadisii''ti vatvaa ``siileneva saddhi.m marissaamii''ti tattheva nipanno tameva roga.m sammasanto arahatta.m patvaa bhikkhusa"nghassa imaahi gaathaahi byaakaasi --
[21] ``phu.t.thassa me a~n~natarena byaadhinaa,
[27] rogena baa.lha.m dukhitassa ruppato.
[26] parisussati khippamida.m ka.levara.m,
[22] puppha.m yathaa pa.msuni aatape kata.m..
[21] ``aja~n~na.m ja~n~nasa"nkhaata.m, asuci.m sucisammata.m.
[22] naanaaku.napaparipuura.m, ja~n~naruupa.m apassato..
[21] ``dhiratthu ^a^M1.0047^ea^ ma.m aatura.m puutikaaya.m, duggandhiya.m asuci byaadhidhamma.m.
[22] yatthappamattaa adhimucchitaa pajaa, haapenti magga.m sugatuupapattiyaa''ti..
[03] arahantaadiina.m pana siila.m sabbadarathappa.tippassaddhiyaa parisuddhattaa ^b^pa.tippassaddhipaarisuddhii^eb^ti veditabba.m. eva.m pariyantapaarisuddhiaadivasena pa~ncavidha.m.
[03] dutiyapa~ncake ^a^V1.0047^ea^ paa.naatipaataadiina.m pahaanaadivasena attho veditabbo. vutta~nheta.m pa.tisambhidaaya.m --

[03] ``pa~nca siilaani paa.naatipaatassa pahaana.m siila.m, verama.nii siila.m, cetanaa siila.m, sa.mvaro siila.m, aviitikkamo siila.m. adinnaadaanassa, kaamesumicchaacaarassa, musaavaadassa, pisu.naaya vaacaaya, pharusaaya vaacaaya, samphappalaapassa, abhijjhaaya, byaapaadassa, micchaadi.t.thiyaa, nekkhammena kaamacchandassa, abyaapaadena byaapaadassa, aalokasa~n~naaya thinamiddhassa, avikkhepena uddhaccassa, dhammavavatthaanena vicikicchaaya, ~naa.nena avijjaaya, paamojjena aratiyaa, pa.thamena jhaanena niivara.naana.m, dutiyena jhaanena vitakkavicaaraana.m, tatiyena jhaanena piitiyaa, catutthena jhaanena sukhadukkhaana.m, aakaasaana~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa ruupasa~n~naaya pa.tighasa~n~naaya naanattasa~n~naaya, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~naaya, aaki~nca~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~naaya, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~naaya, aniccaanupassanaaya niccasa~n~naaya, dukkhaanupassanaaya sukhasa~n~naaya, anattaanupassanaaya attasa~n~naaya, nibbidaanupassanaaya nandiyaa, viraagaanupassanaaya raagassa, nirodhaanupassanaaya samudayassa, pa.tinissaggaanupassanaaya aadaanassa, khayaanupassanaaya ghanasa~n~naaya, vayaanupassanaaya aayuuhanassa, vipari.naamaanupassanaaya dhuvasa~n~naaya, animittaanupassanaaya nimittassa, appa.nihitaanupassanaaya pa.nidhiyaa, su~n~nataanupassanaaya abhinivesassa, adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya saaraadaanaabhinivesassa, yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanena sammohaabhinivesassa, aadiinavaanupassanaaya aalayaabhinivesassa, pa.tisa"nkhaanupassanaaya appa.tisa"nkhaaya, viva.t.tanaanupassanaaya sa~n~nogaabhinivesassa, sotaapattimaggena di.t.theka.t.thaana.m ^a^M1.0048^ea^ kilesaana.m, sakadaagaamimaggena o.laarikaana.m kilesaana.m, anaagaamimaggena a.nusahagataana.m kilesaana.m, arahattamaggena sabbakilesaana.m pahaana.m siila.m, verama.nii, cetanaa, sa.mvaro, aviitikkamo siila.m. evaruupaani siilaani cittassa avippa.tisaaraaya sa.mvattanti, paamojjaaya sa.mvattanti, piitiyaa sa.mvattanti, passaddhiyaa sa.mvattanti, somanassaaya sa.mvattanti, aasevanaaya sa.mvattanti, bhaavanaaya sa.mvattanti, bahuliikammaaya sa.mvattanti, ala"nkaaraaya sa.mvattanti, parikkhaaraaya sa.mvattanti, parivaaraaya sa.mvattanti, paaripuuriyaa sa.mvattanti, ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya ^a^V1.0048^ea^ nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti (pa.ti0 ma0 1.41).

[03] ettha ca pahaananti koci dhammo naama natthi a~n~natra vuttappakaaraana.m paa.naatipaataadiina.m anuppaadamattato. yasmaa pana ta.m ta.m pahaana.m tassa tassa kusaladhammassa pati.t.thaana.t.thena upadhaara.na.m hoti, vikampaabhaavakara.nena ca samaadaana.m. tasmaa pubbe vutteneva upadhaara.nasamaadhaanasa"nkhaatena siilana.t.thena siilanti vutta.m. itare cattaaro dhammaa tato tato verama.nivasena, tassa tassa sa.mvaravasena, tadubhayasampayuttacetanaavasena, ta.m ta.m aviitikkamantassa aviitikkamanavasena ca cetaso pavattisabbhaava.m sandhaaya vuttaa. siila.t.tho pana tesa.m pubbe pakaasitoyevaati. eva.m pahaanasiilaadivasena pa~ncavidha.m.

[03] ettaavataa ca ki.m siila.m? kena.t.thena siila.m? kaanassa lakkha.narasapaccupa.t.thaanapada.t.thaanaani? kimaanisa.msa.m siila.m? katividha.m ceta.m siilanti? imesa.m pa~nhaana.m vissajjana.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ ya.m pana vutta.m ``ko cassa sa.mkileso, ki.m vodaana''nti. tatra vadaama -- kha.n.daadibhaavo siilassa sa.mkileso, akha.n.daadibhaavo vodaana.m. so pana kha.n.daadibhaavo laabhayasaadihetukena bhedena ca sattavidhamethunasa.myogena ca sa"ngahito.

[03] tathaa hi yassa sattasu aapattikkhandhesu aadimhi vaa ante vaa sikkhaapada.m bhinna.m hoti, tassa siila.m pariyante chinnasaa.tako viya ^b^kha.n.da.m^eb^ naama ^a^M1.0049^ea^ hoti. yassa pana vemajjhe bhinna.m, tassa majjhe chiddasaa.tako viya ^b^chidda.m^eb^ naama hoti. yassa pa.tipaa.tiyaa dve tii.ni bhinnaani, tassa pi.t.thiyaa vaa kucchiyaa vaa u.t.thitena visabhaagava.n.nena kaa.larattaadiina.m a~n~natarasariirava.n.naa gaavii viya ^b^sabala.m^eb^ naama hoti. yassa antarantaraa bhinnaani, tassa antarantaraa visabhaagava.n.nabinduvicitraa gaavii viya ^b^kammaasa.m^eb^ naama hoti. eva.m taava laabhaadihetukena bhedena kha.n.daadibhaavo hoti.
[03] eva.m ^a^V1.0049^ea^ sattavidhamethunasa.myogavasena. vutta~nhi bhagavataa --

[02] ``idha, braahma.na, ekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa sammaa brahmacaarii pa.tijaanamaano na heva kho maatugaamena saddhi.m dvaya.mdvayasamaapatti.m samaapajjati, apica kho maatugaamassa ucchaadana.m parimaddana.m nhaapana.m sambaahana.m saadiyati, so tadassaadeti, ta.m nikaameti, tena ca vitti.m aapajjati, idampi kho, braahma.na, brahmacariyassa kha.n.dampi chiddampi sabalampi kammaasampi. aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, aparisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati sa.myutto methunena sa.myogena, na parimuccati jaatiyaa. jaraaya mara.nena...pe0... na parimuccati dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[02] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, idhekacco sama.no vaa...pe0... pa.tijaanamaano na heva kho maatugaamena saddhi.m dvaya.m dvayasamaapatti.m samaapajjati. napi maatugaamassa ucchaadana.m...pe0... saadiyati. apica kho maatugaamena saddhi.m sa~njagghati sa.mkii.lati sa.mkelaayati, so tadassaadeti...pe0... na parimuccati dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[02] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, idhekacco sama.no vaa...pe0... na heva kho maatugaamena saddhi.m dvaya.m dvayasamaapatti.m samaapajjati. napi maatugaamassa ucchaadana.m...pe0... saadiyati. napi maatugaamena saddhi.m sa~njagghati sa.mkii.lati sa.mkelaayati. apica kho maatugaamassa cakkhunaa cakkhu.m upanijjhaayati pekkhati, so tadassaadeti...pe0... na parimuccati dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[03] ``puna ^a^M1.0050^ea^ capara.m, braahma.na, idhekacco sama.no vaa...pe0... na heva kho maatugaamena... napi maatugaamassa... napi maatugaamena... napi maatugaamassa...pe0... pekkhati. apica kho maatugaamassa sadda.m su.naati tiroku.t.taa vaa tiropaakaaraa vaa hasantiyaa vaa bha.nantiyaa vaa gaayantiyaa vaa rodantiyaa vaa, so tadassaadeti...pe0... dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[02] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, idhekacco sama.no vaa...pe0... na heva kho maatugaamena... napi maatugaamassa... napi maatugaamena... napi maatugaamassa...pe0... rodantiyaa ^a^V1.0050^ea^ vaa. apica kho yaanissa taani pubbe maatugaamena saddhi.m hasitalapitakii.litaani, taani anussarati, so tadassaadeti...pe0... dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[02] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, idhekacco sama.no vaa...pe0... na heva kho maatugaamena...pe0... napi maatugaamassa...pe0... napi yaanissa taani pubbe maatugaamena saddhi.m hasitalapitakii.litaani, taani anussarati. apica kho passati gahapati.m vaa gahapatiputta.m vaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappita.m sama"ngiibhuuta.m paricaarayamaana.m, so tadassaadeti...pe0... dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[02] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, idhekacco sama.no vaa...pe0... na heva kho maatugaamena...pe0... napi passati gahapati.m vaa gahapatiputta.m vaa...pe0... paricaarayamaana.m. apica kho a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya brahmacariya.m carati `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti. so tadassaadeti, ta.m nikaameti, tena ca vitti.m aapajjati. idampi kho, braahma.na, brahmacariyassa kha.n.dampi chiddampi sabalampi kammaasampii''ti (a0 ni0 7.50).
[01] eva.m laabhaadihetukena bhedena ca sattavidhamethunasa.myogena ca kha.n.daadibhaavo sa"ngahitoti veditabbo.

[03] akha.n.daadibhaavo pana sabbaso sikkhaapadaana.m abhedena, bhinnaana~nca sappa.tikammaana.m pa.tikammakara.nena, sattavidhamethunasa.myogaabhaavena ca, aparaaya ^a^M1.0051^ea^ ca ``kodho upanaaho makkho pa.laaso issaa macchariya.m maayaa saatheyya.m thambho saarambho maano atimaano mado pamaado''tiaadiina.m paapadhammaana.m anuppattiyaa, appicchataasantu.t.thitaasallekhataadiina~nca gu.naana.m uppattiyaa sa"ngahito.

[03] yaani hi siilaani laabhaadiinampi atthaaya abhinnaani, pamaadadosena vaa bhinnaanipi pa.tikammakataani ^a^V1.0051^ea^, methunasa.myogehi vaa kodhupanaahaadiihi vaa paapadhammehi anupahataani, taani sabbaso ^b^akha.n.daani acchiddaani asabalaani akammaasaanii^eb^ti vuccanti. taaniyeva bhujissabhaavakara.nato ca ^b^bhujissaani,^eb^ vi~n~nuuhi pasatthattaa ^b^vi~n~nupasatthaani,^eb^ ta.nhaadi.t.thiihi aparaama.t.thattaa ^b^aparaama.t.thaani,^eb^ upacaarasamaadhi.m vaa appanaasamaadhi.m vaa sa.mvattayantiiti ^b^samaadhisa.mvattanikaani^eb^ ca honti. tasmaa nesa.m esa `akha.n.daadibhaavo vodaana'nti veditabbo.

[03] ta.m paneta.m vodaana.m dviihaakaarehi sampajjati siilavipattiyaa ca aadiinavadassanena, siilasampattiyaa ca aanisa.msadassanena. tattha ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa''ti (dii0 ni0 2.149; a0 ni0 5.213) evamaadisuttanayena siilavipattiyaa aadiinavo da.t.thabbo.

[03] apica dussiilo puggalo dussiilyahetu amanaapo hoti devamanussaana.m, ananusaasaniiyo sabrahmacaariina.m, dukkhito dussiilyagarahaasu, vippa.tisaarii siilavata.m pasa.msaasu, taaya ca pana dussiilyataaya saa.nasaa.tako viya dubba.n.no hoti. ye kho panassa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjanti, tesa.m diigharatta.m apaayadukkhaavahanato dukkhasamphasso. yesa.m deyyadhamma.m pa.tigga.nhaati, tesa.m namahapphalakara.nato appaggho. anekavassaga.nikaguuthakuupo viya dubbisodhano. chavaalaatamiva ubhato paribaahiro. bhikkhubhaava.m pa.tijaanantopi abhikkhuyeva goga.na.m anubandhagadrabho viya. satatubbiggo sabbaverikapuriso viya. asa.mvaasaaraho mataka.levara.m viya. sutaadigu.nayuttopi sabrahmacaariina.m apuujaaraho susaanaggi viya braahma.naana.m. abhabbo visesaadhigame andho viya ruupadassane. niraaso saddhamme ca.n.daalakumaarako viya rajje. sukhitosmiiti ma~n~namaanopi dukkhitova aggikkhandhapariyaaye vuttadukkhabhaagitaaya.

[03] dussiilaana~nhi ^a^M1.0052^ea^ pa~ncakaamagu.naparibhogavandanamaananaadisukhassaadagadhitacittaana.m tappaccaya.m anussara.namattenaapi hadayasantaapa.m janayitvaa u.nhalohituggaarappavattanasamattha.m atika.tuka.m dukkha.m dassento sabbaakaarena paccakkhakammavipaako bhagavaa aaha --

[02] ``passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, amu.m mahanta.m aggikkhandha.m aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta'nti? eva.m, bhanteti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho vara.m ya.m amu.m ^a^V1.0052^ea^ mahanta.m aggikkhandha.m aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m aali"ngetvaa upanisiideyya vaa upanipajjeyya vaa, ya.m khattiyaka~n~na.m vaa braahma.naka~n~na.m vaa gahapatika~n~na.m vaa mudutalunahatthapaada.m aali"ngetvaa upanisiideyya vaa upanipajjeyya vaati. etadeva, bhante, vara.m ya.m khattiyaka~n~na.m vaa...pe0... upanipajjeyya vaa. dukkha.m heta.m, bhante, ya.m amu.m mahanta.m aggikkhandha.m...pe0... upanipajjeyya vaati. aarocayaami vo, bhikkhave, pa.tivedayaami vo, bhikkhave, yathaa etadeva tassa vara.m dussiilassa paapadhammassa asucisa"nkassarasamaacaarassa pa.ticchannakammantassa assama.nassa sama.napa.ti~n~nassa abrahmacaarissa brahmacaaripa.ti~n~nassa antopuutikassa avassutassa kasambujaatassa ya.m amu.m mahanta.m aggikkhandha.m...pe0... upanipajjeyya vaa. ta.m kissa hetu? tatonidaana.m hi so, bhikkhave, mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m, na tveva tappaccayaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyyaa''ti (a0 ni0 7.72).
[03] eva.m aggikkhandhupamaaya itthipa.tibaddhapa~ncakaamagu.naparibhogapaccaya.m dukkha.m dassetvaa eteneva upaayena --

[02] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho vara.m ya.m balavaa puriso da.lhaaya vaa.larajjuyaa ubho ja"nghaa ve.thetvaa gha.mseyya, saa chavi.m chindeyya, chavi.m chetvaa camma.m chindeyya, camma.m chetvaa ma.msa.m chindeyya, ma.msa.m chetvaa nhaaru.m chindeyya, nhaaru.m chetvaa a.t.thi.m chindeyya, a.t.thi.m chetvaa a.t.thimi~nja.m aahacca ti.t.theyya, ya.m vaa khattiyamahaasaalaana.m ^a^M1.0053^ea^ vaa braahma.namahaasaalaana.m vaa gahapatimahaasaalaana.m vaa abhivaadana.m saadiyeyyaa''ti ca.

[02] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho vara.m ya.m balavaa puriso ti.nhaaya sattiyaa teladhotaaya paccorasmi.m pahareyya, ya.m vaa khattiyamahaasaalaana.m vaa braahma.namahaasaalaana.m vaa gahapatimahaasaalaana.m vaa a~njalikamma.m saadiyeyyaa''ti ca.

[02] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho vara.m ya.m balavaa puriso tattena ayopa.t.tena aadittena sampajjalitena sajotibhuutena kaaya.m sampalive.theyya, ya.m vaa khattiyamahaasaalaana.m ^a^V1.0053^ea^ vaa braahma.namahaasaalaana.m vaa gahapatimahaasaalaana.m vaa saddhaadeyya.m ciivara.m paribhu~njeyyaa''ti ca.

[02] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho vara.m ya.m balavaa puriso tattena ayosa"nkunaa aadittena sampajjalitena sajotibhuutena mukha.m vivaritvaa tatta.m lohagu.la.m aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m mukhe pakkhipeyya, ta.m tassa o.t.thampi .daheyya, mukhampi, jivhampi, ka.n.thampi, udarampi .daheyya, antampi antagu.nampi aadaaya adhobhaaga.m nikkhameyya, ya.m vaa khattiya... braahma.na... gahapatimahaasaalaana.m vaa saddhaadeyya.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njeyyaa''ti ca.

[02] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho vara.m ya.m balavaa puriso siise vaa gahetvaa khandhe vaa gahetvaa tatta.m ayoma~nca.m vaa ayopii.tha.m vaa aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m abhinisiidaapeyya vaa abhinipajjaapeyya vaa, ya.m vaa khattiya... braahma.na... gahapatimahaasaalaana.m vaa saddhaadeyya.m ma~ncapii.tha.m paribhu~njeyyaa''ti ca.

[02] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho vara.m ya.m balavaa puriso uddha.mpaada.m adhosira.m gahetvaa tattaaya ayokumbhiyaa pakkhipeyya aadittaaya sampajjalitaaya sajotibhuutaaya ^a^M1.0054^ea^, so tattha phe.nuddehaka.m paccamaano sakimpi uddha.m gaccheyya, sakimpi adho gaccheyya, sakimpi tiriya.m gaccheyya, ya.m vaa khattiya... braahma.na... gahapatimahaasaalaana.m vaa saddhaadeyya.m vihaara.m paribhu~njeyyaa''ti caati (a0 ni0 7.72).
[03] imaahi vaa.larajjuti.nhasattiayopa.t.taayogu.laayoma~ncaayopii.thaayokumbhiiupamaahi abhivaadanaa~njalikammaciivarapi.n.dapaatama~ncapii.thavihaaraparibhogapaccaya.m dukkha.m dassesi. tasmaa --
[21] aggikkhandhaali"nganadukkhaadhikadukkhaka.tukaphala.m.
[22] avijahato kaamasukha.m, sukha.m kuto bhinnasiilassa..
[21] abhivaadanasaadiyane ^a^V1.0054^ea^, ki.m naama sukha.m vipannasiilassa.
[22] da.lhavaa.larajjugha.msanadukkhaadhikadukkhabhaagissa..
[21] saddhaanama~njalikammasaadiyane ki.m sukha.m asiilassa.
[22] sattippahaaradukkhaadhimattadukkhassa ya.mhetu..
[21] ciivaraparibhogasukha.m, ki.m naama asa.myatassa.
[22] yena cira.m anubhavitabbo, niraye jalitaayopa.t.tasamphasso..
[21] madhuropi pi.n.dapaato, halaahalavisuupamo asiilassa.
[22] aadittaa gilitabbaa, ayogu.laa yena ciraratta.m..
[21] sukhasammatopi dukkho, asiilino ma~ncapii.thaparibhogo.
[22] ya.m baadhissanti cira.m, jalitaayoma~ncapii.thaani..
[21] dussiilassa vihaare, saddhaadeyyamhi kaa nivaasa rati.
[22] jalitesu nivasitabba.m, yena ayokumbhimajjhesu..
[21] sa"nkasarasamaacaaro, kasambujaato avassuto paapo.
[22] antopuutiiti ca ya.m, nindanto aaha lokagaru..
[21] dhii jiivita.m asa~n~natassa, tassa sama.najanavesadhaarissa.
[22] assama.nassa upahata.m, khatamattaana.m vahantassa..
[21] guutha.m ^a^M1.0055^ea^ viya ku.napa.m viya, ma.n.danakaamaa vivajjayantiidha.
[22] ya.m naama siilavanto, santo ki.m jiivita.m tassa..
[21] sabbabhayehi ^a^V1.0055^ea^ amutto, mutto sabbehi adhigamasukhehi.
[22] supihitasaggadvaaro, apaayamagga.m samaaruu.lho..
[21] karu.naaya vatthubhuuto, kaaru.nikajanassa naama ko a~n~no.
[22] dussiilasamo dussii, lataaya iti bahuvidhaa dosaati..
[03] evamaadinaa paccavekkha.nena siilavipattiya.m aadiinavadassana.m vuttappakaaravipariitato siilasampattiyaa aanisa.msadassana~nca veditabba.m. apica --
[21] tassa paasaadika.m hoti, pattaciivaradhaara.na.m.
[22] pabbajjaa saphalaa tassa, yassa siila.m sunimmala.m..
[21] attaanuvaadaadibhaya.m, suddhasiilassa bhikkhuno.
[22] andhakaara.m viya ravi.m, hadaya.m naavagaahati..
[21] siilasampattiyaa bhikkhu, sobhamaano tapovane.
[22] pabhaasampattiyaa cando, gagane viya sobhati..
[21] kaayagandhopi paamojja.m, siilavantassa bhikkhuno.
[22] karoti api devaana.m, siilagandhe kathaava kaa..
[21] sabbesa.m gandhajaataana.m, sampatti.m abhibhuyyati.
[22] avighaatii disaa sabbaa, siilagandho pavaayati..
[21] appakaapi kataa kaaraa, siilavante mahapphalaa.
[22] hontiiti siilavaa hoti, puujaasakkaarabhaajana.m..
[21] siilavanta.m na baadhanti, aasavaa di.t.thadhammikaa.
[22] samparaayikadukkhaana.m, muula.m khanati siilavaa..
[21] yaa manussesu sampatti, yaa ca devesu sampadaa.
[22] na saa sampannasiilassa, icchato hoti dullabhaa..
[21] accantasantaa ^a^V1.0056^ea^ pana yaa, aya.m nibbaanasampadaa.
[22] mano sampannasiilassa, tameva anudhaavati..
[21] sabbasampattimuulamhi ^a^M1.0056^ea^, siilamhi iti pa.n.dito.
[22] anekaakaaravokaara.m, aanisa.msa.m vibhaavayeti..

[03] eva~nhi vibhaavayato siilavipattito ubbijjitvaa siilasampattininna.m maanasa.m hoti. tasmaa yathaavutta.m ima.m siilavipattiyaa aadiinava.m ima~nca siilasampattiyaa aanisa.msa.m disvaa sabbaadarena siila.m vodaapetabbanti.
[03] ettaavataa ca ``siile pati.t.thaaya naro sapa~n~no''ti imissaa gaathaaya siilasamaadhipa~n~naamukhena desite visuddhimagge ^b^siila.m^eb^ taava paridiipita.m hoti.
[06] iti saadhujanapaamojjatthaaya kate visuddhimagge
[06] siilaniddeso naama pa.thamo paricchedo.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ idaani ^a^M1.0057^ea^ ^a^V1.0057^ea^ yehi appicchataasantu.t.thitaadiihi gu.nehi vuttappakaarassa siilassa vodaana.m hoti, te gu.ne sampaadetu.m yasmaa samaadinnasiilena yoginaa dhuta"ngasamaadaana.m kaatabba.m. eva~nhissa appicchataasantu.t.thitaasallekhapavivekaapacayaviiriyaarambhasubharataadigu.nasalilavikkhaalitamala.m siila~nceva suparisuddha.m bhavissati, vataani ca sampajjissanti. iti anavajjasiilabbatagu.naparisuddhasabbasamaacaaro poraa.ne ariyava.msattaye pati.t.thaaya catutthassa bhaavanaaraamataasa"nkhaatassa ariyava.msassa adhigamaaraho bhavissati. tasmaa dhuta"ngakatha.m aarabhissaama.

[03] bhagavataa hi pariccattalokaamisaana.m kaaye ca jiivite ca anapekkhaana.m anulomapa.tipada.myeva aaraadhetukaamaana.m kulaputtaana.m terasadhuta"ngaani anu~n~naataani. seyyathida.m -- pa.msukuulika"nga.m, teciivarika"nga.m, pi.n.dapaatika"nga.m, sapadaanacaarika"nga.m, ekaasanika"nga.m, pattapi.n.dika"nga.m, khalupacchaabhattika"nga.m, aara~n~nika"nga.m, rukkhamuulika"nga.m, abbhokaasika"nga.m, sosaanika"nga.m, yathaasanthatika"nga.m, nesajjika"nganti. tattha --
[21] atthato lakkha.naadiihi, samaadaanavidhaanato.
[22] pabhedato bhedato ca, tassa tassaanisa.msato..
[21] kusalattikato ceva, dhutaadiina.m vibhaagato.
[22] samaasabyaasato caapi, vi~n~naatabbo vinicchayo..

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^atthato^eb^ti taava rathikasusaanasa"nkaarakuu.taadiina.m yattha katthaci pa.msuuna.m upari .thitattaa abbhuggata.t.thena tesu tesu pa.msukuulamivaati pa.msukuula.m, atha vaa pa.msu viya kucchitabhaava.m ulatiiti pa.msukuula.m, kucchitabhaava.m gacchatiiti vutta.m hoti. eva.m laddhanibbacanassa pa.msukuulassa dhaara.na.m pa.msukuula.m ^a^V1.0058^ea^, ta.m siilamassaati ^b^pa.msukuuliko^eb^. pa.msukuulikassa a"nga.m ^b^pa.msukuulika"nga.m^eb^. a"nganti kaara.na.m vuccati. tasmaa yena samaadaanena so pa.msukuuliko hoti, tasseta.m adhivacananti veditabba.m.
[03] eteneva nayena sa"nghaa.tiuttaraasa"ngaantaravaasakasa"nkhaata.m ticiivara.m siilamassaati ^b^teciivariko^eb^. teciivarikassa a"nga.m ^b^teciivarika"nga.m^eb^.

[03] bhikkhaasa"nkhaataana.m ^a^M1.0058^ea^ pana aamisapi.n.daana.m paatoti pi.n.dapaato, parehi dinnaana.m pi.n.daana.m patte nipatananti vutta.m hoti. ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m u~nchati ta.m ta.m kula.m upasa"nkamanto gavesatiiti ^b^pi.n.dapaatiko^eb^. pi.n.daaya vaa patitu.m vatametassaati pi.n.dapaatii, patitunti caritu.m, pi.n.dapaatii eva pi.n.dapaatiko. pi.n.dapaatikassa a"nga.m ^b^pi.n.dapaatika"nga.m^eb^.

[03] daana.m vuccati avakha.n.dana.m, apeta.m daanatoti apadaana.m, anavakha.n.dananti attho. saha apadaanena sapadaana.m, avakha.n.danarahita.m anugharanti vutta.m hoti. sapadaana.m caritu.m idamassa siilanti sapadaanacaarii, sapadaanacaarii eva ^b^sapadaanacaariko^eb^. tassa a"nga.m ^b^sapadaanacaarika"nga.m^eb^.
[03] ekaasane bhojana.m ekaasana.m, ta.m siilamassaati ^b^ekaasaniko^eb^. tassa a"nga.m ^b^ekaasanika"nga.m^eb^.

[03] dutiyabhaajanassa pa.tikkhittattaa kevala.m ekasmi.myeva patte pi.n.do pattapi.n.do. idaani pattapi.n.dagaha.ne pattapi.n.dasa~n~na.m katvaa pattapi.n.do siilamassaati ^b^pattapi.n.diko^eb^. tassa a"nga.m ^b^pattapi.n.dika"nga.m^eb^.

[03] ^b^khaluu^eb^ti pa.tisedhanatthe nipaato. pavaaritena sataa pacchaa laddha.m bhatta.m pacchaabhatta.m naama, tassa pacchaabhattassa bhojana.m pacchaabhattabhojana.m, tasmi.m pacchaabhattabhojane pacchaabhattasa~n~na.m katvaa pacchaabhatta.m siilamassaati pacchaabhattiko. na pacchaabhattiko ^b^khalupacchaabhattiko^eb^. samaadaanavasena pa.tikkhittaatirittabhojanasseta.m naama.m. a.t.thakathaaya.m pana vutta.m khaluuti eko saku.no. so mukhena phala.m gahetvaa tasmi.m patite puna a~n~na.m na khaadati. taadiso ayanti khalupacchaabhattiko. tassa a"nga.m ^b^khalupacchaabhattika"nga.m^eb^.
[03] ara~n~ne ^a^V1.0059^ea^ nivaaso siilamassaati ^b^aara~n~niko^eb^. tassa a"nga.m ^b^aara~n~nika"nga.m^eb^.
[03] rukkhamuule nivaaso rukkhamuula.m, ta.m siilamassaati ^b^rukkhamuuliko^eb^. rukkhamuulikassa a"nga.m ^b^rukkhamuulika"nga.m. abbhokaasikasosaanika"ngesupi^eb^ eseva nayo.

[03] yadeva ^a^M1.0059^ea^ santhata.m yathaasanthata.m, ida.m tuyha.m paapu.naatiiti eva.m pa.thama.m uddi.t.thasenaasanasseta.m adhivacana.m. tasmi.m yathaasanthate viharitu.m siilamassaati ^b^yathaasanthatiko^eb^. tassa a"nga.m ^b^yathaasanthatika"nga.m^eb^.
[03] sayana.m pa.tikkhipitvaa nisajjaaya viharitu.m siilamassaati ^b^nesajjiko^eb^. tassa a"nga.m ^b^nesajjika"nga.m^eb^.

[03] sabbaaneva panetaani tena tena samaadaanena dhutakilesattaa dhutassa bhikkhuno a"ngaani, kilesadhunanato vaa dhutanti laddhavohaara.m ~naa.na.m a"nga.m etesanti ^b^dhuta"ngaani^eb^. atha vaa dhutaani ca taani pa.tipakkhaniddhunanato a"ngaani ca pa.tipattiyaatipi ^b^dhuta"ngaani^eb^. eva.m taavettha ^b^atthato^eb^ vi~n~naatabbo vinicchayo.

[03] sabbaaneva panetaani samaadaanacetanaalakkha.naani. vuttampi ceta.m ``yo samaadiyati, so puggalo. yena samaadiyati, cittacetasikaa ete dhammaa. yaa samaadaanacetanaa, ta.m dhuta"nga.m. ya.m pa.tikkhipati, ta.m vatthuu''ti. sabbaaneva ca loluppaviddha.msanarasaani, nilloluppabhaavapaccupa.t.thaanaani appicchataadiariyadhammapada.t.thaanaani. evamettha ^b^lakkha.naadiihi^eb^ veditabbo vinicchayo.

[03] samaadaanavidhaanatotiaadiisu pana pa~ncasu sabbaaneva dhuta"ngaani dharamaane bhagavati bhagavatova santike samaadaatabbaani. parinibbute mahaasaavakassa santike. tasmi.m asati khii.naasavassa, anaagaamissa, sakadaagaamissa, sotaapannassa, tipi.takassa, dvipi.takassa, ekapi.takassa, ekasa"ngiitikassa, a.t.thakathaacariyassa. tasmi.m asati dhuta"ngadharassa, tasmimpi asati cetiya"nga.na.m sammajjitvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa sammaasambuddhassa santike vadantena viya ^a^V1.0060^ea^ samaadaatabbaani, apica sayampi samaadaatu.m va.t.tati eva. ettha ca cetiyapabbate dve bhaatikattheraana.m je.t.thakabhaatu dhuta"ngappicchataaya vatthu kathetabba.m. aya.m taava saadhaara.nakathaa.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ idaani ekekassa samaadaanavidhaanappabhedabhedaanisa.mse va.n.nayissaama. ^b^pa.msukuulika"nga.m^eb^ taava ``gahapatidaanaciivara.m pa.tikkhipaami, pa.msukuulika"nga.m samaadiyaamii''ti ^a^M1.0060^ea^ imesu dviisu vacanesu a~n~natarena samaadinna.m hoti. ida.m taavettha ^b^samaadaana.m^eb^.

[01] eva.m samaadinnadhuta"ngena pana tena sosaanika.m, paapa.nika.m, rathiyaco.la.m, sa"nkaaraco.la.m, sotthiya.m, nhaanaco.la.m, titthaco.la.m, gatapaccaagata.m, aggi.da.d.dha.m, gokhaayita.m, upacikaakhaayita.m, unduurakhaayita.m, antacchinna.m, dasaacchinna.m, dhajaaha.ta.m, thuupaciivara.m, sama.naciivara.m, aabhisekika.m, iddhimaya.m, panthika.m, vaataaha.ta.m, devadattiya.m, saamuddiyantietesu a~n~natara.m ciivara.m gahetvaa phaaletvaa dubbala.t.thaana.m pahaaya thira.t.thaanaani dhovitvaa ciivara.m katvaa poraa.na.m gahapaticiivara.m apanetvaa paribhu~njitabba.m.

[03] tattha ^b^sosaanika^eb^nti susaane patitaka.m. ^b^paapa.nika^eb^nti aapa.nadvaare patitaka.m. ^b^rathiyaco.la^eb^nti pu~n~natthikehi vaatapaanantarena rathikaaya cha.d.ditaco.laka.m. ^b^sa"nkaaraco.la^eb^nti sa"nkaara.t.thaane cha.d.ditaco.laka.m. ^b^sotthiya^eb^nti gabbhamala.m pu~nchitvaa cha.d.ditavattha.m. tissaamaccamaataa kira satagghanakena vatthena gabbhamala.m pu~nchaapetvaa pa.msukuulikaa ga.nhissantiiti taalave.limagge cha.d.daapesi. bhikkhuu ji.n.naka.t.thaanatthameva ga.nhanti. ^b^nhaanaco.la^eb^nti ya.m bhuutavejjehi sasiisa.m nhaapitaa kaa.laka.n.nico.lanti cha.d.detvaa gacchanti.

[03] ^b^titthaco.la^eb^nti nhaanatitthe cha.d.ditapilotikaa. ^b^gatapaccaagata^eb^nti ya.m manussaa susaana.m gantvaa paccaagataa nhatvaa cha.d.denti. ^b^aggi.da.d.dha^eb^nti agginaa .da.d.dhappadesa.m. ta~nhi manussaa cha.d.denti. ^b^gokhaayitaadii^eb^ni paaka.taaneva. taadisaanipi hi manussaa cha.d.denti. ^b^dhajaaha.ta^eb^nti naava.m aarohantaa dhaja.m bandhitvaa aaruuhanti. ta.m tesa.m dassanaatikkame gahetu.m va.t.tati. yampi yuddhabhuumiya.m dhaja.m bandhitvaa .thapita.m, ta.m dvinnampi senaana.m gatakaale gahetu.m va.t.tati.

[01] ^b^thuupaciivara^eb^nti ^a^V1.0061^ea^ vammika.m parikkhipitvaa balikamma.m kata.m. ^b^sama.naciivara^eb^nti bhikkhusantaka.m. ^b^aabhisekika^eb^nti ra~n~no abhiseka.t.thaane cha.d.ditaciivara.m. ^b^iddhimaya^eb^nti ehibhikkhuciivara.m. ^b^panthika^eb^nti antaraamagge patitaka.m. ya.m pana saamikaana.m satisammosena patita.m, ta.m thoka.m rakkhitvaa gahetabba.m. ^b^vaataaha.ta^eb^nti vaatena paharitvaa duure paatita.m, ta.m pana saamike apassantena ^a^M1.0061^ea^ gahetu.m va.t.tati. ^b^devadattiya^eb^nti anuruddhattherassa viya devataahi dinnaka.m. ^b^saamuddiya^eb^nti samuddaviiciihi thale ussaarita.m.

[03] ya.m pana sa"nghassa demaati dinna.m, co.lakabhikkhaaya vaa caramaanehi laddha.m, na ta.m pa.msukuula.m. bhikkhudattiyepi ya.m vassaggena gaahetvaa vaa diiyati, senaasanaciivara.m vaa hoti, na ta.m pa.msukuula.m. no gaahaapetvaa dinnameva pa.msukuula.m. tatrapi ya.m daayakehi bhikkhussa paadamuule nikkhitta.m, tena pana bhikkhunaa pa.msukuulikassa hatthe .thapetvaa dinna.m, ta.m ekatosuddhika.m naama. ya.m bhikkhuno hatthe .thapetvaa dinna.m, tena pana paadamuule .thapita.m, tampi ekatosuddhika.m. ya.m bhikkhunopi paadamuule .thapita.m, tenaapi tatheva dinna.m, ta.m ubhatosuddhika.m. ya.m hatthe .thapetvaa laddha.m, hattheyeva .thapita.m, ta.m anukka.t.thaciivara.m naama. iti ima.m pa.msukuulabheda.m ~natvaa pa.msukuulikena ciivara.m paribhu~njitabbanti idamettha ^b^vidhaana.m^eb^.

[03] aya.m pana ^b^pabhedo,^eb^ tayo pa.msukuulikaa ukka.t.tho majjhimo muduuti. tattha sosaanika.myeva ga.nhanto ^b^ukka.t.tho^eb^ hoti. pabbajitaa ga.nhissantiiti .thapitaka.m ga.nhanto ^b^majjhimo^eb^. paadamuule .thapetvaa dinnaka.m ga.nhanto ^b^muduu^eb^ti.
[03] tesu yassa kassaci attano ruciyaa gihidinnaka.m saaditakkha.ne dhuta"nga.m bhijjati. ayamettha ^b^bhedo^eb^.

[03] ^b^aya.m panaanisa.mso,^eb^ ``pa.msukuulaciivara.m nissaaya pabbajjaa''ti (mahaava0 128) vacanato nissayaanuruupapa.tipattisabbhaavo, pa.thame ariyava.mse pati.t.thaana.m, aarakkhadukkhaabhaavo, aparaayattavuttitaa, corabhayena abhayataa, paribhogata.nhaaya abhaavo, sama.nasaaruppaparikkhaarataa, ``appaani ceva sulabhaani ca taani ca anavajjaanii''ti (a0 ni0 4.27; itivu0 101) bhagavataa sa.mva.n.nitapaccayataa, paasaadikataa, appicchataadiina.m phalanipphatti, sammaapa.tipattiyaa anubruuhana.m, pacchimaaya janataaya di.t.thaanugatiaapaadananti.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ tadanantara.m pana ^b^teciivarika"nga.m^eb^ ``catutthakaciivara.m pa.tikkhipaami, teciivarika"nga.m samaadiyaamii''ti imesa.m a~n~nataravacanena samaadinna.m hoti.

[03] ^b^aya.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0063^ea^ ^b^panaanisa.mso,^eb^ teciivariko bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena. tenassa pakkhino viya samaadaayeva gamana.m, appasamaarambhataa, vatthasannidhiparivajjana.m, sallahukavuttitaa, atirekaciivaraloluppappahaana.m, kappiye mattakaaritaaya sallekhavuttitaa, appicchataadiina.m phalanipphattiiti evamaadayo gu.naa sampajjantiiti.
[21] atirekavatthata.nha.m, pahaaya sannidhivivajjito dhiiro.
[22] santosasukharasa~n~nuu, ticiivaradharo bhavati yogii..

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ ^b^pi.n.dapaatika"ngampi^eb^ ``atirekalaabha.m pa.tikkhipaami, pi.n.dapaatika"nga.m samaadiyaamii''ti imesa.m a~n~nataravacanena samaadinna.m hoti.

[03] tena pana pi.n.dapaatikena ``sa"nghabhatta.m, uddesabhatta.m, nimantanabhatta.m, salaakabhatta.m, pakkhika.m, uposathika.m, paa.tipadika.m, aagantukabhatta.m, gamikabhatta.m, gilaanabhatta.m, gilaanupa.t.thaakabhatta.m, vihaarabhatta.m, dhurabhatta.m, vaarakabhatta''nti etaani cuddasa bhattaani na saaditabbaani. sace pana ``sa"nghabhatta.m ga.nhathaa''tiaadinaa nayena avatvaa ``amhaaka.m gehe sa"ngho bhikkha.m ga.nhaatu, tumhepi bhikkha.m ^a^V1.0064^ea^ ga.nhathaa''ti vatvaa dinnaani honti, taani saaditu.m va.t.tanti. sa"nghato niraamisasalaakaapi vihaare pakkabhattampi va.t.tatiyevaati idamassa ^b^vidhaana.m^eb^.

[03] imesa.m pana ti.n.nampi sa"nghabhattaadiatirekalaabha.m saaditakkha.neva dhuta"nga.m bhijjati. ayamettha ^b^bhedo^eb^.

[21] tasmaa ariyasataaci.n.na.m, munipu"ngavava.n.nita.m.
[22] anuyu~njetha medhaavii, yathaasanthataraamatanti..
[03] aya.m yathaasanthatika"nge samaadaanavidhaanappabhedabhedaanisa.msava.n.nanaa.
[03] 36^b^.^eb^ ^b^nesajjika"ngampi^eb^ ^a^V1.0078^ea^ ``seyya.m pa.tikkhipaami, nesajjika"nga.m samaadiyaamii''ti imesa.m a~n~nataravacanena samaadinna.m hoti.
[03] tena pana nesajjikena rattiyaa tiisu yaamesu eka.m yaama.m u.t.thaaya ca"nkamitabba.m. iriyaapathesu hi nipajjitumeva na va.t.tati. idamassa ^b^vidhaana.m^eb^.

[03] ^b^pabhedato^eb^ pana ayampi tividho hoti. tattha ^b^ukka.t.thassa^eb^ neva apassena.m, na dussapallatthikaa, na aayogapa.t.to va.t.tati. ^b^majjhimassa^eb^ imesu tiisu ya.mki~nci va.t.tati. ^b^mudukassa^eb^ apassenampi dussapallatthikaapi aayogapa.t.topi bibbohanampi pa~nca"ngopi satta"ngopi va.t.tati. pa~nca"ngo pana pi.t.thiapassayena saddhi.m kato. satta"ngo naama pi.t.thiapassayena ca ubhatopassesu apassayehi ca saddhi.m kato. ta.m kira mi.laabhayattherassa aka.msu. thero anaagaamii hutvaa parinibbaayi.
[03] imesa.m pana ti.n.nampi seyya.m kappitamatte dhuta"nga.m bhijjati. ayamettha ^b^bhedo^eb^.

[01] ^b^aya.m panaanisa.mso,^eb^ ``seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutto viharatii''ti (dii0 ni0 3.320; ma0 ni0 1.186) vuttassa cetaso vinibandhassa upacchedana.m, sabbakamma.t.thaanaanuyogasappaayataa, paasaadikairiyaapathataa, viiriyaarambhaanukuulataa, sammaapa.tipattiyaa anubruuhananti.
[21] aabhujitvaana palla"nka.m, pa.nidhaaya uju.m tanu.m.
[22] nisiidanto vikampeti, maarassa hadaya.m yati..
[21] seyyasukha.m ^a^M1.0077^ea^ middhasukha.m, hitvaa aaraddhaviiriyo.
[22] nisajjaabhirato bhikkhu, sobhayanto tapovana.m..
[21] niraamisa.m piitisukha.m, yasmaa samadhigacchati.
[22] tasmaa samanuyu~njeyya, dhiiro nesajjika.m vatanti..
[03] aya.m nesajjika"nge samaadaana vidhaanappabheda bhedaanisa.msava.n.nanaa.
[21] kusalattikato ceva, dhutaadiina.m vibhaagato.
[22] samaasabyaasato caapi, vi~n~naatabbo vinicchayoti.. --
[03] imissaa gaathaaya vasena va.n.nanaa hoti.
[03] tattha ^b^kusalattikato^eb^ti sabbaaneva hi dhuta"ngaani sekkhaputhujjanakhii.naasavaana.m vasena siyaa kusalaani, siyaa abyaakataani, natthi dhuta"nga.m akusalanti.

[03] yo pana vadeyya ``paapiccho icchaapakato aara~n~niko hotiiti aadivacanato (a0 ni0 5.181; pari0 325) akusalampi dhuta"nga''nti. so vattabbo -- na maya.m ``akusalacittena ara~n~ne na vasatii''ti vadaama. yassa hi ara~n~ne nivaaso, so aara~n~niko. so ca paapiccho vaa bhaveyya appiccho vaa. imaani pana tena tena samaadaanena dhutakilesattaa dhutassa bhikkhuno a"ngaani, kilesadhunanato vaa dhutanti laddhavohaara.m ~naa.na.m a"ngametesanti dhuta"ngaani. atha vaa dhutaani ca taani pa.tipakkhaniddhunanato a"ngaani ca pa.tipattiyaatipi dhuta"ngaaniiti vutta.m. na ca akusalena koci dhuto naama hoti, yassetaani a"ngaani bhaveyyu.m, na ca akusala.m ki~nci dhunaati, yesa.m ta.m a"ngantikatvaa dhuta"ngaaniiti vucceyyu.m. naapi akusala.m ciivaraloluppaadiini ceva niddhunaati pa.tipattiyaa ca a"nga.m hoti. tasmaa suvuttamida.m ``natthi akusala.m dhuta"nga''nti.

[03] ``yesampi ^a^M1.0078^ea^ kusalattikavinimutta.m dhuta"nga.m, tesa.m atthato dhuta"ngameva natthi. asanta.m kassa dhunanato dhuta"nga.m naama bhavissati. dhutagu.ne samaadaaya vattatiiti vacanavirodhopi ca nesa.m aapajjati, tasmaa ta.m na gahetabba''nti aya.m taava kusalattikato va.n.nanaa.
[03] ^b^dhutaadiina.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0080^ea^ ^b^vibhaagato^eb^ti dhuto veditabbo. dhutavaado veditabbo. dhutadhammaa veditabbaa. dhuta"ngaani veditabbaani. kassa dhuta"ngasevanaa sappaayaati veditabba.m.
[03] tattha ^b^dhuto^eb^ti dhutakileso vaa puggalo kilesadhunano vaa dhammo.
[03] ^b^dhutavaado^eb^ti ettha pana atthi dhuto na dhutavaado, atthi na dhuto dhutavaado, atthi neva dhuto na dhutavaado, atthi dhuto ceva dhutavaado ca.

[03] tattha yo dhuta"ngena attano kilese dhuni, para.m pana dhuta"ngena na ovadati, naanusaasati baakulatthero viya, aya.m dhuto na dhutavaado. yathaaha, ``tayida.m aayasmaa baakulo dhuto na dhutavaado''ti. yo pana na dhuta"ngena attano kilese dhuni, kevala.m a~n~ne dhuta"ngena ovadati anusaasati upanandatthero viya, aya.m na dhuto dhutavaado. yathaaha, ``tayida.m aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto na dhuto dhutavaado''ti. yo ubhayavipanno laa.ludaayii viya, aya.m neva dhuto na dhutavaado. yathaaha, ``tayida.m aayasmaa laa.ludaayii neva dhuto na dhutavaado''ti. yo pana ubhayasampanno dhammasenaapati viya, aya.m dhuto ceva dhutavaado ca. yathaaha, ``tayida.m aayasmaa saariputto dhuto ceva dhutavaado caati.

[03] ^b^dhutadhammaa veditabbaa^eb^ti appicchataa, santu.t.thitaa, sallekhataa, pavivekataa, idamatthitaati ime dhuta"ngacetanaaya parivaarakaa pa~nca dhammaa ``appicchata.myeva nissaayaa''tiaadivacanato (a0 ni0 5.181; pari0 325) dhutadhammaa naama, tattha appicchataa ca santu.t.thitaa ca alobho. sallekhataa ca pavivekataa ca dviisu dhammesu anupatanti alobhe ca amohe ca. idamatthitaa ~naa.nameva. tattha ^a^M1.0079^ea^ ca alobhena pa.tikkhepavatthuusu lobha.m, amohena tesveva aadiinavapa.ticchaadaka.m moha.m dhunaati. alobhena ca anu~n~naataana.m pa.tisevanamukhena pavatta.m kaamasukhaanuyoga.m, amohena dhuta"ngesu atisallekhamukhena pavatta.m attakilamathaanuyoga.m dhunaati. tasmaa ime dhammaa dhutadhammaati veditabbaa.
[03] ^b^dhuta"ngaani veditabbaanii^eb^ti terasa dhuta"ngaani veditabbaani pa.msukuulika"nga.m...pe0... nesajjika"nganti. taani atthato lakkha.naadiihi ca vuttaaneva.

[03] kassa ^a^V1.0081^ea^ dhuta"ngasevanaa sappaayaati raagacaritassa ceva mohacaritassa ca. kasmaa? dhuta"ngasevanaa hi dukkhaapa.tipadaa ceva sallekhavihaaro ca. dukkhaapa.tipada~nca nissaaya raago vuupasammati. sallekha.m nissaaya appamattassa moho pahiiyati. aara~n~nika"ngarukkhamuulika"ngapa.tisevanaa vaa ettha dosacaritassaapi sappaayaa. tattha hissa asa"ngha.t.tiyamaanassa viharato dosopi vuupasammatiiti aya.m dhutaadiina.m vibhaagato va.n.nanaa.

[03] ^b^samaasabyaasato^eb^ti imaani pana dhuta"ngaani ^b^samaasato^eb^ tii.ni siisa"ngaani, pa~nca asambhinna"ngaaniiti a.t.theva honti. tattha sapadaanacaarika"nga.m, ekaasanika"nga.m, abbhokaasika"nganti imaani tii.ni siisa"ngaani. sapadaanacaarika"nga~nhi rakkhanto pi.n.dapaatika"ngampi rakkhissati. ekaasanika"nga~nca rakkhato pattapi.n.dika"ngakhalupacchaabhattika"ngaanipi surakkhaniiyaani bhavissanti. abbhokaasika"nga.m rakkhantassa ki.m atthi rukkhamuulika"ngayathaasanthatika"ngesu rakkhitabba.m naama. iti imaani tii.ni siisa"ngaani, aara~n~nika"nga.m, pa.msukuulika"nga.m, teciivarika"nga.m, nesajjika"nga.m, sosaanika"nganti imaani pa~nca asambhinna"ngaani caati a.t.theva honti.

[03] puna dve ciivarapa.tisa.myuttaani, pa~nca pi.n.dapaatapa.tisa.myuttaani, pa~nca senaasanapa.tisa.myuttaani, eka.m viiriyapa.tisa.myuttanti eva.m cattaarova honti. tattha nesajjika"nga.m viiriyapa.tisa.myutta.m. itaraani paaka.taaneva.

[01] puna sabbaaneva nissayavasena dve honti paccayanissitaani dvaadasa, viiriyanissita.m ekanti. sevitabbaasevitabbavasenapi dveyeva honti. yassa hi dhuta"nga.m sevantassa kamma.t.thaana.m va.d.dhati, tena sevitabbaani. yassa sevato haayati, tena na sevitabbaani. yassa pana sevatopi asevatopi va.d.dhateva, na haayati, tenaapi pacchima.m janata.m anukampantena sevitabbaani. yassaapi ^a^M1.0080^ea^ sevatopi asevatopi na va.d.dhati, tenaapi sevitabbaaniyeva aayati.m vaasanatthaayaati.

[03] eva.m sevitabbaasevitabbavasena duvidhaanipi sabbaaneva cetanaavasena ekavidhaani honti. ekameva hi dhuta"nga.m samaadaanacetanaati. a.t.thakathaayampi vutta.m ``yaa cetanaa, ta.m dhuta"nganti vadantii''ti.

[03] ^b^byaasato^eb^ ^a^V1.0082^ea^ pana bhikkhuuna.m terasa, bhikkhuniina.m a.t.tha, saama.neraana.m dvaadasa, sikkhamaanasaama.neriina.m satta, upaasakaupaasikaana.m dveti dvaacattaaliisa honti. sace pana abbhokaase aara~n~nika"ngasampanna.m susaana.m hoti, ekopi bhikkhu ekappahaarena sabbadhuta"ngaani paribhu~njitu.m sakkoti. bhikkhuniina.m pana aara~n~nika"nga.m khalupacchaabhattika"nga~nca dvepi sikkhaapadeneva pa.tikkhittaani, abbhokaasika"nga.m, rukkhamuulika"nga.m, sosaanika"nganti imaani tii.ni dupparihaaraani. bhikkhuniyaa hi dutiyika.m vinaa vasitu.m na va.t.tati. evaruupe ca .thaane samaanacchandaa dutiyikaa dullabhaa. sacepi labheyya sa.msa.t.thavihaarato na mucceyya. eva.m sati yassatthaaya dhuta"nga.m seveyya, svevassaa attho na sampajjeyya. eva.m paribhu~njitu.m asakku.neyyataaya pa~nca haapetvaa bhikkhuniina.m a.t.theva hontiiti veditabbaani. yathaavuttesu pana .thapetvaa teciivarika"nga.m sesaani dvaadasa saama.neraana.m, satta sikkhamaanasaama.neriina.m veditabbaani. upaasakaupaasikaana.m pana ekaasanika"nga.m, pattapi.n.dika"nganti imaani dve patiruupaani ceva sakkaa ca paribhu~njitunti dve dhuta"ngaaniiti eva.m byaasato dvecattaaliisa hontiiti aya.m samaasabyaasato va.n.nanaa.

[03] ettaavataa ca ``siile pati.t.thaaya naro sapa~n~no''ti imissaa gaathaaya siilasamaadhipa~n~naamukhena desite visuddhimagge yehi appicchataasantu.t.thitaadiihi gu.nehi vuttappakaarassa siilassa vodaana.m hoti, tesa.m sampaadanattha.m samaadaatabbadhuta"ngakathaa bhaasitaa hoti.
[06] iti saadhujanapaamojjatthaaya kate visuddhimagge
[06] dhuta"nganiddeso naama dutiyo paricchedo.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ idaani ^a^M1.0081^ea^ ^a^V1.0083^ea^ yasmaa eva.m dhuta"ngaparihara.nasampaaditehi appicchataadiihi gu.nehi pariyodaate imasmi.m siile pati.t.thitena ``siile pati.t.thaaya naro sapa~n~no, citta.m pa~n~na~nca bhaavaya''nti vacanato cittasiisena niddi.t.tho samaadhi bhaavetabbo. so ca atisa"nkhepadesitattaa vi~n~naatumpi taava na sukaro, pageva bhaavetu.m, tasmaa tassa vitthaara~nca bhaavanaanaya~nca dassetu.m ida.m pa~nhaakamma.m hoti.

[03] ko samaadhi? kena.t.thena samaadhi? kaanassa lakkha.narasapaccupa.t.thaanapada.t.thaanaani? katividho samaadhi? ko cassa sa.mkileso? ki.m vodaana.m? katha.m bhaavetabbo? samaadhibhaavanaaya ko aanisa.msoti?

[03] tatrida.m vissajjana.m. ^b^ko samaadhii^eb^ti samaadhi bahuvidho naanappakaarako. ta.m sabba.m vibhaavayitu.m aarabbhamaana.m vissajjana.m adhippeta~nceva attha.m na saadheyya, uttari ca vikkhepaaya sa.mvatteyya, tasmaa idhaadhippetameva sandhaaya vadaama, kusalacittekaggataa samaadhi.

[03] ^b^kena.t.thena samaadhii^eb^ti samaadhaana.t.thena samaadhi. kimida.m samaadhaana.m naama? ekaaramma.ne cittacetasikaana.m sama.m sammaa ca aadhaana.m, .thapananti vutta.m hoti. tasmaa yassa dhammassaanubhaavena ekaaramma.ne cittacetasikaa sama.m sammaa ca avikkhipamaanaa avippaki.n.naa ca hutvaa ti.t.thanti, ida.m samaadhaananti veditabba.m.

[03] ^b^kaanassa lakkha.narasapaccupa.t.thaanapada.t.thaanaanii^eb^ti ettha pana avikkhepalakkha.no samaadhi, vikkhepaviddha.msanaraso, avikampanapaccupa.t.thaano. ``sukhino citta.m samaadhiyatii''ti vacanato pana sukhamassa pada.t.thaana.m.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ ^b^katividho^eb^ ^a^V1.0084^ea^ ^b^samaadhii^eb^ti avikkhepalakkha.nena taava ekavidho. upacaaraappanaavasena duvidho, tathaa lokiyalokuttaravasena sappiitikanippiitikavasena sukhasahagataupekkhaasahagatavasena ca. tividho hiinamajjhimapa.niitavasena ^a^M1.0082^ea^, tathaa savitakkasavicaaraadivasena piitisahagataadivasena parittamahaggatappamaa.navasena ca. catubbidho dukkhaapa.tipadaadandhaabhi~n~naadivasena, tathaa parittaparittaaramma.naadivasena catujhaana"ngavasena haanabhaagiyaadivasena kaamaavacaraadivasena adhipativasena ca. pa~ncavidho pa~ncakanaye pa~ncajhaana"ngavasenaati.

[03] tattha ^b^ekavidhako.t.thaaso^eb^ uttaanatthoyeva. ^b^duvidhako.t.thaase^eb^ channa.m anussati.t.thaanaana.m mara.nassatiyaa upasamaanussatiyaa aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naaya catudhaatuvavatthaanassaati imesa.m vasena laddhacittekaggataa, yaa ca appanaasamaadhiina.m pubbabhaage ekaggataa, aya.m ^b^upacaarasamaadhi^eb^. ``pa.thamassa jhaanassa parikamma.m pa.thamassa jhaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo''ti aadivacanato pana yaa parikammaanantaraa ekaggataa, aya.m ^b^appanaasamaadhii^eb^ti eva.m upacaarappanaavasena duvidho.
[03] dutiyaduke tiisu bhuumiisu kusalacittekaggataa lokiyo samaadhi. ariyamaggasampayuttaa ekaggataa lokuttaro samaadhiiti eva.m lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidho.

[03] tatiyaduke catukkanaye dviisu pa~ncakanaye tiisu jhaanesu ekaggataa sappiitiko samaadhi. avasesesu dviisu jhaanesu ekaggataa nippiitiko samaadhi. upacaarasamaadhi pana siyaa sappiitiko, siyaa nippiitikoti eva.m sappiitikanippiitikavasena duvidho.

[03] catutthaduke catukkanaye tiisu pa~ncakanaye catuusu jhaanesu ekaggataa sukhasahagato samaadhi. avasesasmi.m upekkhaasahagato samaadhi. upacaarasamaadhi pana siyaa sukhasahagato, siyaa upekkhaasahagatoti eva.m sukhasahagataupekkhaasahagatavasena duvidho.
[03] ^b^tikesu^eb^ ^a^V1.0085^ea^ pa.thamattike pa.tiladdhamatto hiino, naatisubhaavito majjhimo, subhaavito vasippatto pa.niitoti eva.m hiinamajjhimapa.niitavasena tividho.

[03] dutiyattike ^a^M1.0083^ea^ pa.thamajjhaanasamaadhi saddhi.m upacaarasamaadhinaa savitakkasavicaaro. pa~ncakanaye dutiyajjhaanasamaadhi avitakkavicaaramatto. yo hi vitakkamatteyeva aadiinava.m disvaa vicaare adisvaa kevala.m vitakkappahaanamatta.m aaka"nkhamaano pa.thamajjhaana.m atikkamati, so avitakkavicaaramatta.m samaadhi.m pa.tilabhati. ta.m sandhaayeta.m vutta.m. catukkanaye pana dutiyaadiisu pa~ncakanaye tatiyaadiisu tiisu jhaanesu ekaggataa avitakkaavicaaro samaadhiiti eva.m savitakkasavicaaraadivasena tividho.

[03] tatiyattike catukkanaye aadito dviisu pa~ncakanaye ca tiisu jhaanesu ekaggataa piitisahagato samaadhi. tesveva tatiye ca catutthe ca jhaane ekaggataa sukhasahagato samaadhi. avasaane upekkhaasahagato. upacaarasamaadhi pana piitisukhasahagato vaa hoti upekkhaasahagato vaati eva.m piitisahagataadivasena tividho.

[03] catutthattike upacaarabhuumiya.m ekaggataa paritto samaadhi. ruupaavacaraaruupaavacarakusale ekaggataa mahaggato samaadhi. ariyamaggasampayuttaa ekaggataa appamaa.no samaadhiiti eva.m parittamahaggatappamaa.navasena tividho.
[03] catukkesu pa.thamacatukke atthi samaadhi dukkhaapa.tipado dandhaabhi~n~no, atthi dukkhaapa.tipado khippaabhi~n~no, atthi sukhaapa.tipado dandhaabhi~n~no, atthi sukhaapa.tipado khippaabhi~n~noti.

[03] tattha pa.thamasamannaahaarato pa.t.thaaya yaava tassa tassa jhaanassa upacaara.m uppajjati, taava pavattaa samaadhibhaavanaa ^b^pa.tipadaa^eb^ti vuccati. upacaarato pana pa.t.thaaya yaava appanaa, taava pavattaa ^a^V1.0086^ea^ pa~n~naa ^b^abhi~n~naa^eb^ti vuccati. saa panesaa pa.tipadaa ekaccassa dukkhaa hoti, niivara.naadipaccaniikadhammasamudaacaaragaha.nataaya kicchaa asukhaasevanaati attho. ekaccassa tadabhaavena sukhaa. abhi~n~naapi ekaccassa dandhaa hoti mandaa asiighappavatti. ekaccassa khippaa amandaa siighappavatti.

[03] tattha yaani parato sappaayaasappaayaani ca palibodhupacchedaadiini pubbakiccaani ca appanaakosallaani ca va.n.nayissaama, tesu yo asappaayasevii ^a^M1.0084^ea^ hoti, tassa dukkhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaa ca abhi~n~naa hoti. sappaayasevino sukhaa pa.tipadaa khippaa ca abhi~n~naa. yo pana pubbabhaage asappaaya.m sevitvaa aparabhaage sappaayasevii hoti, pubbabhaage vaa sappaaya.m sevitvaa aparabhaage asappaayasevii, tassa vomissakataa veditabbaa. tathaa palibodhupacchedaadika.m pubbakicca.m asampaadetvaa bhaavanamanuyuttassa dukkhaa pa.tipadaa hoti. vipariyaayena sukhaa. appanaakosallaani pana asampaadentassa dandhaa abhi~n~naa hoti. sampaadentassa khippaa.

[01] apica ta.nhaaavijjaavasena samathavipassanaadhikaaravasena caapi etaasa.m pabhedo veditabbo. ta.nhaabhibhuutassa hi dukkhaa pa.tipadaa hoti. anabhibhuutassa sukhaa. avijjaabhibhuutassa ca dandhaa abhi~n~naa hoti. anabhibhuutassa khippaa. yo ca samathe akataadhikaaro, tassa dukkhaa pa.tipadaa hoti. kataadhikaarassa sukhaa. yo pana vipassanaaya akataadhikaaro hoti, tassa dandhaa abhi~n~naa hoti, kataadhikaarassa khippaa. kilesindriyavasena caapi etaasa.m pabhedo veditabbo. tibbakilesassa hi mudindriyassa dukkhaa pa.tipadaa hoti dandhaa ca abhi~n~naa, tikkhindriyassa pana khippaa abhi~n~naa. mandakilesassa ca mudindriyassa sukhaa pa.tipadaa hoti dandhaa ca abhi~n~naa. tikkhindriyassa pana khippaa abhi~n~naati.

[03] iti imaasu pa.tipadaaabhi~n~naasu yo puggalo dukkhaaya pa.tipadaaya dandhaaya ca abhi~n~naaya samaadhi.m paapu.naati, tassa so samaadhi dukkhaapa.tipado dandhaabhi~n~noti vuccati. esa nayo sesattayepiiti eva.m dukkhaapa.tipadaadandhaabhi~n~naadivasena catubbidho.

[03] dutiyacatukke atthi samaadhi paritto parittaaramma.no, atthi paritto appamaa.naaramma.no, atthi appamaa.no parittaaramma.no, atthi appamaa.no appamaa.naaramma.noti. tattha yo samaadhi appagu.no ^a^V1.0087^ea^ uparijhaanassa paccayo bhavitu.m na sakkoti, aya.m paritto. yo pana ava.d.dhite aaramma.ne pavatto, aya.m parittaaramma.no. yo pagu.no subhaavito, uparijhaanassa paccayo bhavitu.m sakkoti, aya.m appamaa.no. yo ca va.d.dhite aaramma.ne pavatto, aya.m appamaa.naaramma.no. vuttalakkha.navomissataaya pana vomissakanayo veditabbo. eva.m parittaparittaaramma.naadivasena catubbidho.

[01] tatiyacatukke ^a^M1.0085^ea^ vikkhambhitaniivara.naana.m vitakkavicaarapiitisukhasamaadhiina.m vasena pa~nca"ngika.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m, tato vuupasantavitakkavicaara.m tiva"ngika.m dutiya.m, tato virattapiitika.m duva"ngika.m tatiya.m, tato pahiinasukha.m upekkhaavedanaasahitassa samaadhino vasena duva"ngika.m catuttha.m. iti imesa.m catunna.m jhaanaana.m a"ngabhuutaa cattaaro samaadhii honti. eva.m catujhaana"ngavasena catubbidho.

[03] catutthacatukke atthi samaadhi haanabhaagiyo, atthi .thitibhaagiyo, atthi visesabhaagiyo, atthi nibbedhabhaagiyo. tattha paccaniikasamudaacaaravasena haanabhaagiyataa, tadanudhammataaya satiyaa sa.n.thaanavasena .thitibhaagiyataa, uparivisesaadhigamavasena visesabhaagiyataa, nibbidaasahagatasa~n~naamanasikaarasamudaacaaravasena nibbedhabhaagiyataa ca veditabbaa. yathaaha, ``pa.thamassa jhaanassa laabhi.m kaamasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti haanabhaaginii pa~n~naa. tadanudhammataa sati santi.t.thati .thitibhaaginii pa~n~naa. avitakkasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti visesabhaaginii pa~n~naa. nibbidaasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti viraaguupasa~nhitaa nibbedhabhaaginii pa~n~naa''ti (vibha0 799). taaya pana pa~n~naaya sampayuttaa samaadhiipi cattaaro hontiiti. eva.m haanabhaagiyaadivasena catubbidho.

[01] pa~ncamacatukke kaamaavacaro samaadhi, ruupaavacaro samaadhi, aruupaavacaro samaadhi, apariyaapanno samaadhiiti eva.m cattaaro samaadhii. tattha sabbaapi upacaarekaggataa kaamaavacaro samaadhi. tathaa ruupaavacaraadikusalacittekaggataa itare tayoti eva.m kaamaavacaraadivasena catubbidho.

[03] cha.t.thacatukke ``chanda.m ce bhikkhu adhipati.m karitvaa labhati samaadhi.m, labhati cittassekaggata.m, aya.m vuccati chandasamaadhi...pe0... viiriya.m ce bhikkhu...pe0... citta.m ce bhikkhu...pe0... viima.msa.m ce bhikkhu adhipati.m karitvaa labhati samaadhi.m, labhati cittassekaggata.m ^a^V1.0088^ea^, aya.m vuccati viima.msaasamaadhii''ti (vibha0 432; sa.m0 ni0 3.825) eva.m adhipativasena catubbidho.

[03] ^b^pa~ncake^eb^ ^a^M1.0086^ea^ ya.m catukkabhede vutta.m dutiya.m jhaana.m, ta.m vitakkamattaatikkamena dutiya.m, vitakkavicaaraatikkamena tatiyanti eva.m dvidhaa bhinditvaa pa~nca jhaanaani veditabbaani. tesa.m a"ngabhuutaa ca pa~nca samaadhiiti eva.m pa~ncajhaana"ngavasena pa~ncavidhataa veditabbaa.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ ^b^ko cassa sa.mkileso ki.m vodaana^eb^nti ettha pana vissajjana.m vibha"nge vuttameva. vutta~nhi tattha ``sa.mkilesanti haanabhaagiyo dhammo. vodaananti visesabhaagiyo dhammo''ti (vibha0 828). tattha ``pa.thamassa jhaanassa laabhi.m kaamasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti haanabhaaginii pa~n~naa''ti (vibha0 799) iminaa nayena haanabhaagiyadhammo veditabbo. ``avitakkasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti visesabhaaginii pa~n~naa''ti (vibha0 799) iminaa nayena visesabhaagiyadhammo veditabbo.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ ^b^katha.m bhaavetabbo^eb^ti ettha pana yo taava aya.m lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidhotiaadiisu ariyamaggasampayutto samaadhi vutto, tassa bhaavanaanayo pa~n~naabhaavanaanayeneva sa"ngahito. pa~n~naaya hi bhaavitaaya so bhaavito hoti. tasmaa ta.m sandhaaya eva.m bhaavetabboti na ki~nci visu.m vadaama.

[03] yo panaaya.m lokiyo, so vuttanayena siilaani visodhetvaa suparisuddhe siile pati.t.thitena yvaassa dasasu palibodhesu palibodho atthi, ta.m upacchinditvaa kamma.t.thaanadaayaka.m kalyaa.namitta.m upasa"nkamitvaa attano cariyaanukuula.m cattaaliisaaya kamma.t.thaanesu a~n~natara.m kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa samaadhibhaavanaaya ananuruupa.m vihaara.m pahaaya anuruupe vihaare viharantena khuddakapalibodhupaccheda.m katvaa sabba.m bhaavanaavidhaana.m aparihaapentena bhaavetabboti ayamettha sa"nkhepo.
[03] aya.m ^a^V1.0089^ea^ pana vitthaaro, ya.m taava vutta.m ``yvaassa dasasu palibodhesu palibodho atthi, ta.m upacchinditvaa''ti, ettha --
[21] aavaaso ca kula.m laabho, ga.no kamma~nca pa~ncama.m.
[22] addhaana.m ~naati aabaadho, gantho iddhiiti te dasaati.. --
[03] ime ^a^M1.0087^ea^ dasa palibodhaa naama. tattha aavaasoyeva aavaasapalibodho. esa nayo kulaadiisu.

[03] tattha ^b^aavaaso^eb^ti ekopi ovarako vuccati ekampi parive.na.m sakalopi sa"nghaaraamo. svaaya.m na sabbasseva palibodho hoti. yo panettha navakammaadiisu ussukka.m vaa aapajjati, bahubha.n.dasannicayo vaa hoti, yena kenaci vaa kaara.nena apekkhavaa pa.tibaddhacitto, tasseva palibodho hoti, na itarassa.

[03] tatrida.m vatthu -- dve kira kulaputtaa anuraadhapuraa nikkhamitvaa anupubbena thuupaaraame pabbaji.msu. tesu eko dve maatikaa pagu.naa katvaa pa~ncavassiko hutvaa pavaaretvaa paacinakha.n.daraaji.m naama gato. eko tattheva vasati. paacinakha.n.daraajigato tattha cira.m vasitvaa thero hutvaa cintesi ``pa.tisallaanasaaruppamida.m .thaana.m, handa na.m sahaayakassaapi aarocemii''ti. tato nikkhamitvaa anupubbena thuupaaraama.m paavisi. pavisanta.myeva ca na.m disvaa samaanavassikatthero paccuggantvaa pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa vatta.m akaasi. aagantukatthero senaasana.m pavisitvaa cintesi ``idaani me sahaayo sappi.m vaa phaa.nita.m vaa paanaka.m vaa pesessati. aya~nhi imasmi.m nagare ciranivaasii''ti. so ratti.m aladdhaa paato cintesi ``idaani upa.t.thaakehi gahita.m yaagukhajjaka.m pesessatii''ti. tampi adisvaa ``pahi.nantaa natthi, pavi.t.thassa ma~n~ne dassatii''ti paatova tena saddhi.m gaama.m paavisi. te dve eka.m viithi.m caritvaa u.lu"nkamatta.m yaagu.m labhitvaa aasanasaalaaya.m nisiiditvaa pivi.msu. tato aagantuko cintesi ``nibaddhayaagu ma~n~ne natthi, bhattakaale idaani manussaa pa.niita.m bhatta.m dassantii''ti, tato bhattakaalepi pi.n.daaya caritvaa laddhameva bhu~njitvaa itaro aaha -- ``ki.m, bhante, sabbakaala.m eva.m yaapethaa''ti? aamaavusoti. bhante, paacinakha.n.daraaji phaasukaa, tattha gacchaamaati. thero nagarato ^a^V1.0090^ea^ dakkhi.nadvaarena nikkhamanto kumbhakaaragaamamagga.m pa.tipajji. itaro aaha -- ``ki.m pana, bhante, ima.m magga.m pa.tipannatthaa''ti? nanu tvamaavuso, paacinakha.n.daraajiyaa va.n.na.m abhaasiiti? ki.m pana, bhante, tumhaaka.m ettaka.m kaala.m vasita.t.thaane na koci atirekaparikkhaaro atthiiti? aamaavuso ma~ncapii.tha.m sa"nghika.m, ta.m pa.tisaamitameva, a~n~na.m ki~nci natthiiti. mayha.m pana, bhante ^a^M1.0088^ea^, kattarada.n.do telanaa.li upaahanatthavikaa ca tatthevaati. tayaavuso, ekadivasa.m vasitvaa ettaka.m .thapitanti? aama, bhante. so pasannacitto thera.m vanditvaa ``tumhaadisaana.m, bhante, sabbattha ara~n~navaasoyeva. thuupaaraamo catunna.m buddhaana.m dhaatunidhaana.t.thaana.m, lohapaasaade sappaaya.m dhammassavana.m mahaacetiyadassana.m theradassana~nca labbhati, buddhakaalo viya pavattati. idheva tumhe vasathaa''ti dutiyadivase pattaciivara.m gahetvaa sayameva agamaasiiti. iidisassa aavaaso na palibodho hoti.

[03] ^b^kula^eb^nti ~naatikula.m vaa upa.t.thaakakula.m vaa. ekaccassa hi upa.t.thaakakulampi ``sukhitesu sukhito''tiaadinaa (vibha0 888; sa.m0 ni0 4.241) nayena sa.msa.t.thassa viharato palibodho hoti, so kulamaanusakehi vinaa dhammassavanaaya saamantavihaarampi na gacchati. ekaccassa maataapitaropi palibodhaa na honti, kora.n.dakavihaaravaasittherassa bhaagineyyadaharabhikkhuno viya.

[03] so kira uddesattha.m roha.na.m agamaasi. therabhaginiipi upaasikaa sadaa thera.m tassa pavatti.m pucchati. thero ekadivasa.m dahara.m aanessaamiiti roha.naabhimukho paayaasi. daharopi ``cira.m me idha vuttha.m, upajjhaaya.m daani passitvaa upaasikaaya ca pavatti.m ~natvaa aagamissaamii''ti roha.nato nikkhami. te ubhopi ga"ngaatiire samaagacchi.msu. so a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule therassa vatta.m katvaa ``kuhi.m yaasii''ti pucchito tamattha.m aarocesi. thero su.t.thu te kata.m, upaasikaapi sadaa pucchati, ahampi etadatthameva aagato, gaccha tva.m, aha.m pana idheva ima.m vassa.m vasissaamiiti ta.m uyyojesi. so vassuupanaayikadivaseyeva ta.m vihaara.m patto. senaasanampissa pitaraa kaaritameva patta.m.

[03] athassa pitaa dutiyadivase aagantvaa ``kassa, bhante, amhaaka.m senaasana.m patta''nti pucchanto ``aagantukassa daharassaa''ti sutvaa ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa aaha -- ``bhante, amhaaka.m ^a^V1.0091^ea^ senaasane vassa.m upagatassa vatta.m atthii''ti. ki.m upaasakaati? temaasa.m amhaaka.myeva ghare bhikkha.m gahetvaa pavaaretvaa gamanakaale aapucchitabbanti. so tu.nhibhaavena adhivaasesi. upaasakopi ghara.m gantvaa ``amhaaka.m aavaase eko ^a^M1.0089^ea^ aagantuko ayyo upagato sakkacca.m upa.t.thaatabbo''ti aaha. upaasikaa ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadesi. daharopi bhattakaale ~naatighara.m agamaasi. na na.m koci sa~njaani.

[03] so temaasampi tattha pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa vassa.mvuttho ``aha.m gacchaamii''ti aapucchi. athassa ~naatakaa ``sve, bhante, gacchathaa''ti dutiyadivase ghareyeva bhojetvaa telanaa.li.m puuretvaa eka.m gu.lapi.n.da.m navahattha~nca saa.taka.m datvaa ``gacchatha, bhante''ti aaha.msu. so anumodana.m katvaa roha.naabhimukho paayaasi.

[03] upajjhaayopissa pavaaretvaa pa.tipatha.m aagacchanto pubbe di.t.tha.t.thaaneyeva ta.m addasa. so a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule therassa vatta.m akaasi. atha na.m thero pucchi ``ki.m, bhaddamukha, di.t.thaa te upaasikaa''ti? so ``aama, bhante''ti sabba.m pavatti.m aarocetvaa tena telena therassa paade makkhetvaa gu.lena paanaka.m katvaa tampi saa.taka.m therasseva datvaa thera.m vanditvaa ``mayha.m, bhante, roha.na.myeva sappaaya''nti agamaasi. theropi vihaara.m aagantvaa dutiyadivase kora.n.dakagaama.m paavisi.

[03] upaasikaapi ``mayha.m bhaataa mama putta.m gahetvaa idaani aagacchatii''ti sadaa magga.m olokayamaanaava ti.t.thati. saa ta.m ekakameva aagacchanta.m disvaa ``mato me ma~n~ne putto, aya.m thero ekakova aagacchatii''ti therassa paadamuule nipatitvaa paridevamaanaa rodi. thero ``nuuna daharo appicchataaya attaana.m ajaanaapetvaava gato''ti ta.m samassaasetvaa sabba.m pavatti.m aarocetvaa pattatthavikato ta.m saa.taka.m niiharitvaa dasseti.

[03] upaasikaa pasiiditvaa puttena gatadisaabhimukhaa urena nipajjitvaa namassamaanaa aaha -- ``mayha.m puttasadisa.m vata ma~n~ne bhikkhu.m kaayasakkhi.m katvaa bhagavaa rathaviniitapa.tipada.m (ma0 ni0 1.252 aadayo), naalakapa.tipada.m (su0 ni0 684 aadayo), tuva.t.takapa.tipada.m (su0 ni0 921 aadayo), catupaccayasantosabhaavanaaraamataadiipaka.m mahaaariyava.msapa.tipada~nca (a0 ni0 4.28; dii0 ni0 3.309) desesi ^a^V1.0092^ea^. vijaatamaatuyaa naama gehe temaasa.m bhu~njamaanopi `aha.m ^a^M1.0090^ea^ putto tva.m maataa'ti na vakkhati, aho acchariyamanusso''ti. evaruupassa maataapitaropi palibodhaa na honti, pageva a~n~na.m upa.t.thaakakula''nti.

[03] ^b^laabho^eb^ti cattaaro paccayaa. te katha.m palibodhaa honti? pu~n~navantassa hi bhikkhuno gatagata.t.thaane manussaa mahaaparivaare paccaye denti. so tesa.m anumodento dhamma.m desento sama.nadhamma.m kaatu.m na okaasa.m labhati. aru.nuggamanato yaava pa.thamayaamo, taava manussasa.msaggo na upacchijjati. puna balavapaccuuseyeva baahullikapi.n.dapaatikaa aagantvaa ``bhante, asuko upaasako upaasikaa amacco amaccadhiitaa tumhaaka.m dassanakaamaa''ti vadanti, so ga.nhaavuso, pattaciivaranti gamanasajjova hotiiti niccabyaava.to, tasseva te paccayaa palibodhaa honti. tena ga.na.m pahaaya yattha na.m na jaananti, tattha ekakena caritabba.m. eva.m so palibodho upacchijjatiiti.

[03] ^b^ga.no^eb^ti suttantikaga.no vaa aabhidhammikaga.no vaa, yo tassa uddesa.m vaa paripuccha.m vaa dento sama.nadhammassa okaasa.m na labhati, tasseva ga.no palibodho hoti, tena so eva.m upacchinditabbo. sace tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m bahu gahita.m hoti, appa.m avasi.t.tha.m, ta.m ni.t.thapetvaa ara~n~na.m pavisitabba.m. sace appa.m gahita.m, bahu avasi.t.tha.m, yojanato para.m agantvaa antoyojanaparicchede a~n~na.m ga.navaacaka.m upasa"nkamitvaa ``ime aayasmaa uddesaadiihi sa"nga.nhatuu''ti vattabba.m. eva.m alabhamaanena ``mayhamaavuso, eka.m kicca.m atthi, tumhe yathaaphaasuka.t.thaanaani gacchathaa''ti ga.na.m pahaaya attano kamma.m kattabbanti.

[03] ^b^kamma^eb^nti navakamma.m. ta.m karontena va.d.dhakiiaadiihi laddhaaladdha.m jaanitabba.m, kataakate ussukka.m aapajjitabbanti sabbadaa palibodho hoti. sopi eva.m upacchinditabbo, sace appa.m avasi.t.tha.m hoti ni.t.thapetabba.m. sace bahu, sa"nghika~nce navakamma.m, sa"nghassa vaa sa"nghabhaarahaarakabhikkhuuna.m vaa niyyaadetabba.m. attano santaka~nce, attano bhaarahaarakaana.m niyyaadetabba.m. taadise alabhantena sa"nghassa pariccajitvaa gantabbanti.

[03] ^b^addhaana^eb^nti ^a^M1.0091^ea^ maggagamana.m. yassa hi katthaci pabbajjaapekkho vaa hoti, paccayajaata.m vaa ^a^V1.0093^ea^ ki~nci laddhabba.m hoti. sace ta.m alabhanto na sakkoti adhivaasetu.m, ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karontassapi gamikacitta.m naama duppa.tivinodaniiya.m hoti, tasmaa gantvaa ta.m kicca.m tiiretvaava sama.nadhamme ussukka.m kaatabbanti.

[03] ^b^~naatii^eb^ti vihaare aacariyupajjhaayasaddhivihaarikaantevaasikasamaanupajjhaayakasamaanaacariyakaa, ghare maataa pitaa bhaataati evamaadikaa. te gilaanaa imassa palibodhaa honti, tasmaa so palibodho upa.t.thahitvaa tesa.m paakatikakara.nena upacchinditabbo.

[03] tattha upajjhaayo taava gilaano sace lahu.m na vu.t.thaati, yaavajiivampi pa.tijaggitabbo. tathaa pabbajjaacariyo upasampadaacariyo saddhivihaariko upasampaaditapabbaajitaantevaasikasamaanupajjhaayakaa ca. nissayaacariyauddesaacariyanissayantevaasikauddesantevaasikasamaanaacariyakaa pana yaava nissayauddesaa anupacchinnaa, taava pa.tijaggitabbaa. pahontena tato uddhampi pa.tijaggitabbaa eva. maataapituusu upajjhaaye viya pa.tipajjitabba.m. sacepi hi te rajje .thitaa honti, puttato ca upa.t.thaana.m paccaasiisanti, kaatabbameva. atha tesa.m bhesajja.m natthi, attano santaka.m daatabba.m. asati bhikkhaacariyaaya pariyesitvaapi daatabbameva. bhaatubhaginiina.m pana tesa.m santakameva yojetvaa daatabba.m. sace natthi attano santaka.m taavakaalika.m datvaa pacchaa labhantena ga.nhitabba.m. alabhantena na codetabbaa. a~n~naatakassa bhaginisaamikassa bhesajja.m neva kaatu.m na daatu.m va.t.tati. ``tuyha.m saamikassa dehii''ti vatvaa pana bhaginiyaa daatabba.m. bhaatujaayaayapi eseva nayo. tesa.m pana puttaa imassa ~naatakaa evaati tesa.m kaatu.m va.t.tatiiti.

[03] ^b^aabaadho^eb^ti yokoci rogo. so baadhayamaano palibodho hoti, tasmaa bhesajjakara.nena upacchinditabbo. sace pana katipaaha.m bhesajja.m karontassapi na vuupasammati, naaha.m tuyha.m daaso, na bha.tako, ta.myeva ^a^M1.0092^ea^ hi posento anamatagge sa.msaarava.t.te dukkha.m pattoti attabhaava.m garahitvaa sama.nadhammo kaatabboti.
[03] ^b^gantho^eb^ti ^a^V1.0094^ea^ pariyattihara.na.m. ta.m sajjhaayaadiihi niccabyaava.tassa palibodho hoti, na itarassa. tatrimaani vatthuuni --

[03] majjhimabhaa.nakadevatthero kira malayavaasidevattherassa santika.m gantvaa kamma.t.thaana.m yaaci. thero kiidisosi, aavuso, pariyattiyanti pucchi. majjhimo me, bhante, pagu.noti. aavuso, majjhimo naameso dupparihaaro, muulapa.n.naasa.m sajjhaayantassa majjhimapa.n.naasako aagacchati, ta.m sajjhaayantassa uparipa.n.naasako. kuto tuyha.m kamma.t.thaananti? bhante, tumhaaka.m santike kamma.t.thaana.m labhitvaa puna na olokessaamiiti kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa ekuunaviisativassaani sajjhaaya.m akatvaa viisatime vasse arahatta.m patvaa sajjhaayatthaaya aagataana.m bhikkhuuna.m ``viisati me, aavuso, vassaani pariyatti.m anolokentassa, apica kho kataparicayo ahamettha aarabhathaa''ti vatvaa aadito pa.t.thaaya yaava pariyosaanaa ekabya~njanepissa ka"nkhaa naahosi.

[01] karu.liyagirivaasiinaagattheropi a.t.thaarasavassaani pariyatti.m cha.d.detvaa bhikkhuuna.m dhaatukatha.m uddisi. tesa.m gaamavaasikattherehi saddhi.m sa.msandentaana.m ekapa~nhopi uppa.tipaa.tiyaa aagato naahosi.

[03] mahaavihaarepi tipi.takacuu.laabhayatthero naama a.t.thakatha.m anuggahetvaava pa~ncanikaayama.n.dale tii.ni pi.takaani parivattessaamiiti suva.n.nabheri.m paharaapesi. bhikkhusa"ngho katamaacariyaana.m uggaho, attano aacariyuggaha~n~neva vadatu, itarathaa vattu.m na demaati aaha. upajjhaayopi na.m attano upa.t.thaanamaagata.m pucchi ``tvamaavuso, bheri.m paharaapesii''ti? aama, bhante. ki.m kaara.naati? pariyatti.m, bhante, parivattessaamiiti. aavuso abhaya, aacariyaa ida.m pada.m katha.m vadantiiti? eva.m vadanti, bhanteti. thero hunti pa.tibaahi. puna so a~n~nena a~n~nena pariyaayena eva.m vadanti bhanteti tikkhattu.m aaha. thero sabba.m hunti pa.tibaahitvaa ``aavuso, tayaa ^a^M1.0093^ea^ pa.thama.m kathito eva aacariyamaggo, aacariyamukhato pana anuggahitattaa `eva.m aacariyaa vadantii'ti sa.n.thaatu.m naasakkhi. gaccha attano aacariyaana.m santike su.naahii''ti. kuhi.m, bhante, gacchaamiiti? ga"ngaaya parato roha.najanapade tulaadhaarapabbatavihaare sabbapariyattiko mahaadhammarakkhitatthero naama vasati, tassa santika.m gacchaati. saadhu, bhanteti thera.m vanditvaa pa~ncahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m therassa santika.m gantvaa vanditvaa nisiidi. thero kasmaa aagatosiiti ^a^V1.0095^ea^ pucchi. dhamma.m sotu.m, bhanteti. aavuso abhaya, diighamajjhimesu ma.m kaalena kaala.m pucchanti. avasesa.m pana me ti.msamattaani vassaani na olokitapubba.m. apica tva.m ratti.m mama santike parivattehi. aha.m te divaa kathayissaamiiti. so saadhu, bhanteti tathaa akaasi. parive.nadvaare mahaama.n.dapa.m kaaretvaa gaamavaasino divase divase dhammassavanatthaaya aagacchanti. thero ratti.m parivatti. ta.m divaa kathayanto anupubbena desana.m ni.t.thapetvaa abhayattherassa santike ta.t.tikaaya nisiiditvaa ``aavuso, mayha.m kamma.t.thaana.m kathehii''ti aaha. bhante, ki.m bha.natha, nanu mayaa tumhaakameva santike suta.m? kimaha.m tumhehi a~n~naata.m kathessaamiiti? tato na.m thero a~n~no esa, aavuso, gatakassa maggo naamaati aaha. abhayathero kira tadaa sotaapanno hoti. athassa so kamma.t.thaana.m datvaa aagantvaa lohapaasaade dhamma.m parivattento thero parinibbutoti assosi. sutvaa ``aaharathaavuso, ciivara''nti ciivara.m paarupitvaa ``anucchaviko, aavuso, amhaaka.m aacariyassa arahattamaggo. aacariyo no, aavuso, uju aajaaniiyo. so attano dhammantevaasikassa santike ta.t.tikaaya nisiiditvaa `mayha.m kamma.t.thaana.m kathehii'ti aaha. anucchaviko, aavuso, therassa arahattamaggo''ti. evaruupaana.m gantho palibodho na hotiiti.

[03] ^b^iddhii^eb^ti pothujjanikaa iddhi. saa hi uttaanaseyyakadaarako viya taru.nasassa.m viya ca dupparihaaraa hoti. appamattakeneva bhijjati. saa pana vipassanaaya palibodho hoti, na samaadhissa, samaadhi.m patvaa pattabbato. tasmaa vipassanatthikena iddhipalibodho upacchinditabbo, itarena avasesaati aya.m taava palibodhakathaaya vitthaaro.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ ^b^kamma.t.thaanadaayaka.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0094^ea^ ^b^kalyaa.namitta.m upasa"nkamitvaa^eb^ti ettha pana duvidha.m kamma.t.thaana.m sabbatthakakamma.t.thaana.m paarihaariyakamma.t.thaana~nca. tattha sabbatthakakamma.t.thaana.m naama bhikkhusa"nghaadiisu mettaa mara.nassati ca. asubhasa~n~naatipi eke.

[01] kamma.t.thaanikena hi bhikkhunaa pa.thama.m taava paricchinditvaa siima.t.thakabhikkhusa"nghe sukhitaa hontu abyaapajjaati mettaa bhaavetabbaa. tato siima.t.thakadevataasu. tato gocaragaamamhi issarajane. tato ^a^V1.0096^ea^ tattha manusse upaadaaya sabbasattesu. so hi bhikkhusa"nghe mettaaya sahavaasiina.m muducittata.m janeti. athassa te sukhasa.mvaasaa honti. siima.t.thakadevataasu mettaaya mudukatacittaahi devataahi dhammikaaya rakkhaaya susa.mvihitarakkho hoti. gocaragaamamhi issarajane mettaaya mudukatacittasantaanehi issarehi dhammikaaya rakkhaaya surakkhitaparikkhaaro hoti. tattha manussesu mettaaya pasaaditacittehi tehi aparibhuuto hutvaa vicarati. sabbasattesu mettaaya sabbattha appa.tihatacaaro hoti. mara.nassatiyaa pana avassa.m mayaa maritabbanti cintento anesana.m pahaaya uparuupari va.d.dhamaanasa.mvego anoliinavuttiko hoti. asubhasa~n~naaparicitacittassa panassa dibbaanipi aaramma.naani lobhavasena citta.m na pariyaadiyanti.
[03] eva.m bahuupakaarattaa sabbattha atthayitabba.m icchitabbanti ca adhippetassa yogaanuyogakammassa .thaana~ncaati ^b^sabbatthakakamma.t.thaana^eb^nti vuccati.

[03] cattaaliisaaya pana kamma.t.thaanesu ya.m yassa cariyaanukuula.m, ta.m tassa nicca.m pariharitabbattaa uparimassa ca uparimassa bhaavanaakammassa pada.t.thaanattaa ^b^paarihaariyakamma.t.thaana^eb^nti vuccati. iti ima.m duvidhampi kamma.t.thaana.m yo deti, aya.m ^b^kamma.t.thaanadaayako^eb^ naama. ta.m kamma.t.thaanadaayaka.m.
[03] kalyaa.namittanti --
[21] piyo garu bhaavaniiyo, vattaa ca vacanakkhamo.
[22] gambhiira~nca katha.m kattaa, no ca.t.thaane niyojakoti.. (a0 ni0 7.37).
[03] evamaadigu.nasamannaagata.m ekantena hitesi.m vuddhipakkhe .thita.m kalyaa.namitta.m.

[03] ``mama.m ^a^M1.0095^ea^ hi, aananda, kalyaa.namitta.m aagamma jaatidhammaa sattaa jaatiyaa parimuccantii''ti (sa.m0 ni0 1.129; 5.2) aadivacanato pana sammaasambuddhoyeva sabbaakaarasampanno kalyaa.namitto. tasmaa tasmi.m sati tasseva bhagavato santike gahitakamma.t.thaana.m sugahita.m hoti. parinibbute pana tasmi.m asiitiyaa mahaasaavakesu yo dharati, tassa ^a^V1.0097^ea^ santike gahetu.m va.t.tati. tasmi.m asati ya.m kamma.t.thaana.m gahetukaamo hoti, tasseva vasena catukkapa~ncakajjhaanaani nibbattetvaa jhaanapada.t.thaana.m vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa aasavakkhayappattassa khii.naasavassa santike gahetabba.m.

[03] ki.m pana khii.naasavo aha.m khii.naasavoti attaana.m pakaasetiiti? ki.m vattabba.m, kaarakabhaava.m hi jaanitvaa pakaaseti. nanu assaguttatthero aaraddhakamma.t.thaanassa bhikkhuno ``kamma.t.thaanakaarako aya''nti jaanitvaa aakaase cammakha.n.da.m pa~n~naapetvaa tattha palla"nkena nisinno kamma.t.thaana.m kathesiiti.

[03] tasmaa sace khii.naasava.m labhati, icceta.m kusala.m, no ce labhati, anaagaamisakadaagaamisotaapannajhaanalaabhiiputhujjanatipi.takadharadvipi.takadharaekapi.takadharesu purimassa purimassa santike. ekapi.takadharepi asati yassa ekasa"ngiitipi a.t.thakathaaya saddhi.m pagu.naa, aya~nca lajjii hoti, tassa santike gahetabba.m. evaruupo hi tantidharo va.msaanurakkhako pave.niipaalako aacariyo aacariyamatikova hoti, na attanomatiko hoti. teneva poraa.nakattheraa ``lajjii rakkhissati lajjii rakkhissatii''ti tikkhattu.m aaha.msu.

[03] pubbe vuttakhii.naasavaadayo cettha attanaa adhigatamaggameva aacikkhanti. bahussuto pana ta.m ta.m aacariya.m upasa"nkamitvaa uggahaparipucchaana.m visodhitattaa ito cito ca sutta~nca kaara.na~nca sallakkhetvaa sappaayaasappaaya.m yojetvaa gahana.t.thaane gacchanto mahaahatthii viya mahaamagga.m dassento kamma.t.thaana.m kathessati. tasmaa evaruupa.m kamma.t.thaanadaayaka.m kalyaa.namitta.m upasa"nkamitvaa tassa vattapa.tipatti.m katvaa kamma.t.thaana.m gahetabba.m.

[03] sace ^a^M1.0096^ea^ paneta.m ekavihaareyeva labhati, icceta.m kusala.m, no ce labhati, yattha so vasati, tattha gantabba.m. gacchantena ca na dhotamakkhitehi paadehi upaahanaa aaruuhitvaa chatta.m gahetvaa telanaa.limadhuphaa.nitaadiini gaahaapetvaa antevaasikaparivutena gantabba.m. gamikavatta.m pana puuretvaa attano pattaciivara.m sayameva gahetvaa antaraamagge ya.m ya.m vihaara.m pavisati sabbattha vattapa.tipatti.m kurumaanena sallahukaparikkhaarena paramasallekhavuttinaa hutvaa gantabba.m.

[03] ta.m ^a^V1.0098^ea^ vihaara.m pavisantena antaraamaggeyeva dantaka.t.tha.m kappiya.m kaaraapetvaa gahetvaa pavisitabba.m, na ca ``muhutta.m vissametvaa paadadhovanamakkhanaadiini katvaa aacariyassa santika.m gamissaamii''ti a~n~na.m parive.na.m pavisitabba.m. kasmaa? sace hissa tatra aacariyassa visabhaagaa bhikkhuu bhaveyyu.m, te aagamanakaara.na.m pucchitvaa aacariyassa ava.n.na.m pakaasetvaa ``na.t.thosi, sace tassa santika.m aagato''ti vippa.tisaara.m uppaadeyyu.m, yena tatova pa.tinivatteyya, tasmaa aacariyassa vasana.t.thaana.m pucchitvaa ujuka.m tattheva gantabba.m.

[03] sace aacariyo daharataro hoti, pattaciivarapa.tiggaha.naadiini na saaditabbaani. sace vu.d.dhataro hoti, gantvaa aacariya.m vanditvaa .thaatabba.m. ``nikkhipaavuso, pattaciivara''nti vuttena nikkhipitabba.m. ``paaniiya.m pivaa''ti vuttena sace icchati paatabba.m. ``paade dhovaahii''ti vuttena na taava paadaa dhovitabbaa. sace hi aacariyena aabhata.m udaka.m bhaveyya, na saaruppa.m siyaa. ``dhovaahaavuso, na mayaa aabhata.m, a~n~nehi aabhata''nti vuttena pana yattha aacariyo na passati, evaruupe pa.ticchanne vaa okaase, abbhokaase vihaarassaapi vaa ekamante nisiiditvaa paadaa dhovitabbaa.

[01] sace aacariyo telanaa.li.m aaharati u.t.thahitvaa ubhohi hatthehi sakkacca.m gahetabbaa. sace hi na ga.nheyya, ``aya.m bhikkhu ito eva pa.t.thaaya sambhoga.m kopetii''ti aacariyassa a~n~nathatta.m bhaveyya. gahetvaa pana na aaditova paadaa makkhetabbaa. sace hi ta.m aacariyassa gattabbha~njanatela.m bhaveyya, na saaruppa.m siyaa. tasmaa siisa.m makkhetvaa ^a^M1.0097^ea^ khandhaadiini makkhetabbaani. ``sabbapaarihaariyatelamida.m, aavuso, paadepi makkhehii''ti vuttena pana thoka.m siise katvaa paade makkhetvaa ``ima.m telanaa.li.m .thapemi, bhante''ti vatvaa aacariye ga.nhante daatabbaa.
